name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 1527 Main St, Vancouver, BC V6A 2W5

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great Toddler/Mommy McDs with large, enclosed play place, climbing structure 2y+, ordering/pay station inside play area, high chairs, NO wifi access, bathroom not in play area, & dirty but not horrid. They had pancakes allday in happy meal & lots of parking. I d recommend, if you need a place to work & eat , while children run in circles screaming. There are many screaming children. Kid-friendliness: Bathrooms, enclosed play area, large climbing structure with slide & padded area. 2yr -12yrs, high chairs, room for strollers, trash, bathrooms Wheelchair accessibility: All on one level, handicapped parking, room in restaurant for wheelchairs

This McDonalds has a great location spot next to Science World and the stadium. Surprisingly, it has free parking with a big parking lot. Its open 24/7 for dine in, take out, and drive through. Kid-friendliness: Has an indoor playground

Well the reason Im giving them a 5 star is because there security caught the thief who actually stole the kids meal I had on the table so when I took little man I was looking after to the restroom so guy took his food and his box of doughnuts and actually drank out of my coffee cup but they handled with respect and I appreciated that from them plus the other people around us where super nice
It was fairly quick with a full line up frendly staff on the drive through

Consistently THE WORST drive thru service. I am asked to pull over and wait a minimum of 7 minutes every time I go. And every time, I have to walk in and demand my food...AND every single time the sauces I PAID FOR are not in the bag. The place is an absolute circus with food delivery guys, homeless, bums, addicted people lurking about everywhere. Its a zoo and the service is atrocious. Im DONE.
This Mc Donald center is fully automated. You can customize everything. Large variety in the menu and nice salad that I havent seen in any other branches before.
Changed my life. The finest 5 star cuisine Ive ever had, how have I never heard of this place? Its like McMagic in my mouth!

In the middle of a heat dome and it was unbelievably hot outside ... walking into the restaurants lovely, air conditioned interior was such a relief! It was crazy busy and totally chaotic but all the staff we dealt with were so friendly and pleasant. There was lots of parking outside and no line-ups at the ordering kiosks and the washroom was spotless. Altogether a great visit.
The place  had a great experience with STAFF and Customers. Very nice,I will go Back.
I have purchased 4 cars from these guys over the years and their service has been outstanding. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a used car in excellent condition!!!!

Clean atmosphere. Not enough staff in the evening, for over a month now there has only been one cashier witch causes slower lines not everybody has a bank card to  pay with online. This also cause customers to get frustrated and angry and even sometimes cause a scene with staff members,  unfortunately One customer was extremely  frustrated he told a staff member to f@#(c) off and the staff member behind the counter said exactly the same words right back to the customer before he walked out.. I have Never experienced this at a McDonalds. Not the staff members fault but if there was more cashiers at the front maybe that could have been avoided.
Quick burger snack for lunch, always fast and tasty
Big place. Clean, I enjoy dine in

Been coming here every Saturday morning for breakfast, and every time I have quality service and food. There are mornings when the line up to the drive-thru is out to the street and we are only in line for 5 mins total and have our food. Other locations have us park and wait 10+ minutes even with no line. All employees work fast but politely. The food is always so fresh and hot. Could not recommend this location enough!
This place is a zoo but they had shamrock shakes in may so they get 5 stars
Great food n drinks

Best thing about this particular McDonald would be the staff. From the Paladin guard that is always alert and courteously opens the door for customers to the guys in the kitchen. Ive dined here three times and each time these guys seem to actually enjoy doing their jobs. Big up to them
Great customer service. Went their around 12:15 and girl named Amrit took my order. She was really polite and humble. Great customer interaction.

As with most McDonalds, Ive had varied experiences but ill just share my most recent one as it was excellent.  The line up in the drive through was long and extended onto the street and through the parking lot. I couldnt believe how fast I got through, especially from ordering to payment to receiving my food. I thanked the lady for being so quick, and enjoyed my food which was hot and made how I asked. Yum!
Good service. Tasty. Modest price
I got a shamrock McFlurry and it was great but man they gotta do something the atmosphere it felt like I was entering the bowels of the earth.

Its McDonalds the best munchies ever omnomnomn Vegetarian options: Theres beyond meat available Dietary restrictions: Fish allergens peanut allergens Parking: If your a customer you dont have to worry about paying for parking Kid-friendliness: No play place however theres an upstairs where kids can be loud and run around Wheelchair accessibility: Its ground level so no need to find a ramp
Fast friendly service and exactly what I ordered.  Great work team. Keep up the good work.

Very very friendly, efficient, & quick service. This drive through was what drive throughs should all be like. Correct order taking, very friendly & well spoken, good at up selling products, & making sure the customer gets the food hot, well prepared, & properly bagged. This was my best tasting, & well bagged Double Quarter Pounder with Cheese meal since the 1980s Special Kudos to this worker. Management should recognize her for her abilities & her #1 standards. ********** Stars for her

For the location and the how clean the restaurant is and the added security. It s a the only place I found that I can bring my small children into where no one is sleeping In the chair s Thanks again the people working in the back are amazing staff.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 2909 Grandview Hwy, Vancouver, BC V5M 2E4

detailed_reviews.review_text: The service is fast and the food served is always fresh and hot. The self order checkout are easy to use and are always clean. The crew their is friendly and make sure that we understand what food we need and sometimes gives suggestions of what is better option. The dine in is cozy and wide especially in the sunshine it looks fabulous.

I usually pass by this McDonalds on the way to work using their mobile app which is very convenient. I usually use the drive-thru. The place looks neat and clean and the crew are very friendly, especially. Susan D Which is a delight to hear her in the drive-thru speaker and the window when youre passing through. Their coffee is very good as well as their muffins

The service is fast and the food served is always fresh and hot. The self order checkout are easy to use and are always clean. The crew their is friendly and make sure that we understand what food we need and sometimes gives suggestions of what is better option. The dine in is cozy and wide especially in the sunshine it looks fabulous. Recently they were giving free samples for their new ice cream and it was yummm. The parking lot has nice flowers and space for parking cars is wide. If I am nearby, I always get an ice cream for sure from here. The patio here though small is good for sitting during summer times.

google keeps asking me to review McDonalds even though this review means nothing to everyone everywhere. You all have an opinion on McDonalds and a strangers words on the internet isnt going to change that. I have attached a photo of one of my orders. I like ordering decaf completely black to see how the cashiers respond to the abomination. Thank you

Social distancing and limited seating in effect. Hand sanitizer at entrance/exit. Arrows to indicate traffic flow one way. Plexiglass shields at cashier as well as food pick up counter. All great safety measures to make you feel safe while ordering or eating here. Update:  service/atmosphere has gone downhill since reopening. Was there Friday night and took well over 6-7min to get my order. I ordered on the app. Restaurant was a mess. I could see kitchen was a mess too with fries all over the floor of the fry station. Staff was standing around chatting in kitchen and in no rush to serve customers. By the way, my fries were cold too. Very disappointed.
This place is well organized, very clean and with great customer service. First time 5 stars for McDonalds.
Something about music list, whoever picked those songs, it s all contemporary and amazing as to make me stay for long and write reviews Cheers Food

I bought for my kids lunch here a double burger and a happymeal.  But when I brought it home my son found it was a single burger. When I went to them the next day with a complaint, the administrator gave me a double burger and happymeal for free. A very positive experience. Thanks to the restaurant and manager.
good location, I have ordered McFish this time.. I can say it was not the freshest fried pattie, but I understand it was around 1.15am.. so no regrets.. it satisfied me and thats all what matter

Good food at reasonable prices and lots of free parking. Good for families on a budget especially when traveling or visiting Vancouver. Includes a playground for children. Vegetarian options: Special request menus available Dietary restrictions: Requests for special orders with extra veggies or salads are available Parking: Large lot for parking and other free parking on Southside of resturant Kid-friendliness: Lots of room for families and large seating areas, including playground. Wheelchair accessibility: Fully available

Im giving this McDonalds 5 stars simply because I needed to blow my nose after getting off the bus and having to get on the SkyTrain.  Why didnt I just go to the Timmies literally just a few steps away right across the street from the SkyTrain station you ask?  Oh I did.  But sadly at 730am they had no toilet paper in their public washroom.  So, wtg, McDonalds!!; One more runny nose saved.  Thank you.
Pretty convenient location. Friendly staff, 24 hours, so late night munchies are well taken care of.
We went through the drive-thru and the attendant that was there, at about 9:00pm yesterday was really friendly and happy. The burger was made with care and was very full. Delightful experience.

Typical McDonalds franchise with a busy drive-through and large dine in area. Located on the busy Grandview Highway just down from the sky train station. This location is always exceedingly busy. Probably because of its excellent location close to transit and car thoroughfares. We went through drive-through today and even though the lineups were extensive through the double drive-through, service was efficient and accurate and the food was hot. What more can you expect from this staple of modern life?  Will come again.
The time of your life. Amazing hamburger dish called a big mac. Im loving it. EAT IT. EAT THE THING. they also serve breakfast now. Im a physicist. Free refills kinda blew my mind. Food
When its raining and you just want some good vibes #McVibes
Excellent drive thru experience!! Fast and accurate order taking. Smiling faces order was perfectly placed in the bag. A, 7 star experience for sure!! Keep up the good work!!
Service was excellent and quality of food was great!

We went by on the drive thru at 11pm, and the lady was so patient with us, even though we took forever to choose. Im very impressed by the customer service this late at night and with so many people lining up! Ill be coming back :))

Take advantage of the awards points they offer check the app each day for new deals  . The workers are always very nice and pleasant  . Coffee muffin deal is the best with everything going up this pairing is the best option

Small cafe with fresh food. Great quality and portion. I felt safe in there because they had the plexiglass installed in between tables. I ordered latte with oat milk and the crab cake brunch and chicken and bacon sandwich. Satisfied.

This was the first time I came for a visit with my friend. We  order two combos of fish burger and dine in there. The place was well cleaned and cozy.  We sat down, washed our hands in the washroom. Not for a while, the manager handed the meals to us with a smiling face. The food  was hot and delicious. Good to try again.

For some reason the mcflurry in this mcdonalds costs less than the other mcdonalds I went to on that same day! This McDonalds also has more modern chairs and tables than some of the other ones Ive been to as they renovated a few years back.
They didn t have the item I asked but the guy in the front was very nice and gave me different options instead
Usually order from doordash here. Orders are always correct and arrive pretty fast, great job to all the workers here, it cant be easy getting everything done so fast in such a popular location.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 2021 Kingsway, Vancouver, BC V5N 2T2

detailed_reviews.review_text: AC worked so dining in was comfortable.  My table was clean enough. Used points for free coffee $2.35 2000 points. Sausage mcmuffin not as good value 4000 points and saved $2.79. Good food though.

Always had a pleasant experience here, simple in and out using the drive though and the staff were friendly. Tried the lil donuts and regular McCafe coffee and no complaints. Simple and easy is what I m looking for from my fast food needs. Service with a smile is always a pleasant welcome.

Good, and fast service. Clean parking facility, nice & tasty drinks. It has wide room to serve inside. But washrooms of men needs to consider clean. Drive through service quick & efficient. Busy and it has sufficient parking area.
Love to go to this Mcd, whenever we work on night. Missing my favourite drive-thru attendant
The morning staff are always so nice! & (Decent latte!)
Its physically beautiful with friendly help full people like me
Drive thru, the lady who took our order made a mistake of giving me a cold French vanilla instead of a hot one.

So my order came up to $14 and I give the lady $20 and I was waiting for change she shoos me away says thats everything... Okay then. Highly doubt Id go back here. Every visit I always encountered some kind 0f problems from multiple wr9ng orders or to the dirty washrooms occupied by homeless or drug users.
Love their coffee... Best in town.
My Home Made Healthy Foods during The Covid-19 while Stying Home

This place used to be good. I have no idea what happened. It takes so long for food to be done. I saw the employees laughing instead of doing their work. They also get the order wrong 99.9% of the time. Only one of the employees were helpful. Edit: everything is back to normal and they got the sauces right omg! Mcdonalds is once again amazing!

It is not about the food although it is good too but rather the honesty and good character of the staff is why I decided to give 5 stars. If I could give 10 I would. On my walk today, I thought I lost my credit card. As I backtracked. It was the staff at this McDonalds that picked it up and saved it. Whoever they are they deserve a raise and reward of recognition. It is people like them that restored my faith in humanity. God bless
Fast drive thru and pleasant people thanks!

I went inside and was greeted by a super sweet and kind female worker. They give me a lot of time to ponder about what i wanted to order and even gave me a few suggestions. very helpful service 10/10. I was also given additional sauces for my fries and burger for no charge. Overall great service compared to other fast food places ive been. Would go again with my friends :)
Its rotten ronnies cant say anything more then that...lol it is what it is
Johnny has the best customer service at this location! He s always smiling and showing so much gratitude towards his customers!
We went to drive through. No complaint about this location because wasnt busy, no wait and got exactly what we ordered so we all happy.
Went here for a morning coffee. My wife had to use the washroom facilities too. The staff is really nice and they even have three KIOSK type portals too. (Only 2 are functional).

Nicer restaurant than most other McDonalds Ive been to. It was so clean it seemed to sparkle lol. Being in a wheelchair typically makes the simplest thing seem like your trying to move mountains by blowing on them; well the first time I went to this location I had a very difficult time maneuvering through the eating area to the till, next day they had rearranged the entire restaurant to accommodate my chair much more easily. The staff seem to be courteous,  helpful, happy,  energetic young people. Best of all the food came to us pipping  hot and absolutely delicious. Thank you very much McDonalds  on Main between 32-37
I go to all different locations, all are great.

This Mcdonalds has improved a lot since last I went quick fast friendly service. It is in East Van and caters to all types of people. Be patient and courteous and you will have a pleasant dining experience.

Been going through this drive thru for my morning coffee for 7 years.  Woman that works the first window during the week is always the same, and she is wonderful; pleasant,  personal and theres never been a mistake on my order even on the busiest of mornings.
The pinnacle of fast-food experience

Great customer service at the drive-thru delivery counter. Been there several late nights and the Guy at the counter is always happy and energetic. Keep it up bro. I dont know your name :(. Will update next time I see you there

Everything was good except because the same guy has to collect the money for both lines because the drive thru is now split into two, they have to confirm your order before you get it.  My food and coffee could of been hotter.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 3695 Lougheed Hwy., Vancouver, BC V5M 2A6

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great location, staff here works hard keeping the place clean. First McDs Ive been in for the last 6 months that had a dry clean washroom floor, even around the fixtures!
They have the best soft serve here. I visit other locations ans you can tell when the machine isnt cleaned regularly. But this location cleans it often. Good job mcds
Very quick and efficient service they have. 3 self order machines are there and huge dining area. Nice view and at good location.
I love the place, the crews, the atmosphere but its just their big mac, patties are already thin and lettuce chopped up.
For McDonalds food it was good, Loved the service fast and very friendly. Parking: There is a reasonable amount of parking Food : 5/5 |

One of the most fanciest McDonalds Ive ever been too. They use automatic machines to do the ordering. You basically select what you one, finish the order, pay by card or get the ticket and pay at the counter. They also do make your own gourmet burger. I was quite skeptical about this, but I must say Im quite impressed with the quality of the burger. The beef patty was juicy and the rest of the ingredients were fresh. Its a bit pricier compared to the usual menu, but totally worth it. I dont generally eat McDonalds but if I do, Id definitely find one that do make your own burger.
Classic Macdonalds. Easily accessible for me and the staff are always busy but they are nice.
I personally work here i love the environment over here and each and every person is very friendly so far .

The system was rebooting. Couldn t place orders for 45 mins. Manager heard my woes and was able to push my mobile order through. Really appreciated it. It was 4 mins from breakfast service so they really helped last min.
Service is super quick. Cannot recommend enough.
Love their food ,service and their excellent way of dealing with their customers

Really nice service. Always ready with the order for Skipthedishes delivery driver. Not like other McDonalds locations where we have to wait for long. Awesome place and dependable service. The servers are so nice and friendly. Good job team.
Great service but lots of not very smart people that parks the trucks here. And blocks the whole parking lot.
Love it all. Great burgers.
Clean , nice service, ice cream available, lots of seating space outside and inside . Looks like a safe harbor for passing by travelers and local visitors. Parking: Not too many parking spots

I go here for lunch when I m working nearby this McDonald s. The food has always been fresh so I m very pleased with this location. The guy who runs food to waiting vehicles is absolutely awesome he deserves a raise!! September 15th 12:05   2022
Old lady s iced coffee is best in Vancouver
Staff is great and deserve more money/employee support and assistance Program. If i am CEO/owner...would build a City free rent. Employees pay utilities/taxes/service.
Consistently the best most reliable and friendliest McDonalds. Management should be proud and recognized.

Was helped my Karam, he was amazing!! Very personable. He gave us well above & beyond the service Im used to from this place. I think he has a bright future with McDonalds or anywhere else he so chooses with that can do attitude :)

Busier location but well run. Drive thru while almost always busy moves quickly, friendly, and efficiently. One of the few McDonalds that actually made my boyfriends bigmac just like the picture. Only issue I have had is the people who block ongoing traffic on Boundary instead of turning the corner and entering from Broadway, but this is not the stores fault just bad drivers and covid increasing drive thru capacity.

It was a very  nice staff that  I ever met. You can imagine a very hot night,   every  one wanted.... ice cream, pop, ice coffee.... But the staff are so nice from the cashier ( cheerful voice , friendly, and very professional staff) All people who  are working there will making you know you will be  taking  care of because  they an un unique group. Iam strongly recommend  Mcdonald of Broadway and Boundary. Please  invite yourself. So that you will  have a good  experience just like us. Best wishes.  And enjoy  what GOD send to us( nice weather,  best place to live in this planet).
So clean!! Every 10 min they are cleaning tables. Serving so politely and fast. Great store and workers
Its McDonalds... food is as expected, service was fine, a little slow, but it was late night and just the drive through.

Just went here and tried the seriously chicken got it crispy with tomato and mozz, I was honestly impressed it didnt feel like a fast food burger, well put together nice flavours real ingredients. I always used to see McDonalds as fast, nothing special food. I feel differently now!

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 160 SW Marine Dr, Vancouver, BC V5X 2R1

detailed_reviews.review_text: Absolutely the greatest McDonalds Ive ever been to. Im visiting from Ontario, and let me say that Ive never had a McDonalds with the level of ambiance and service that I had here. First thing is first, this place is well maintained, from the lawn outside to the tables inside. The washroom is spotless.  The service is amazing, and staff are on and everything, making sure everything is done efficiently and amazing. I had the quarter pounder and fries, and it was the best McDonalds meal I ever had. The meat was absolutely flavor country. Im glad I stopped in here.

First time visiting this branch on a Sunday early morning. All young staff and everyone is really genuinely happy. So happy to see them happy at work. Food meets expectation, clean place and very strong ac. All I needed.

Rose the manager here is the best. Genuinely friendly. Even tho the store was super busy, the vibe with her staff and the atmosphere at this time was very refreshing.  Even as I type this at 6 in the morning.  Well done
Spacious location. They have outdoor patio. Good in summer! Staff is helpful and friendly. We came late evening.  Still crowded with people.  Good experience!!
Any time I come here I have the most amazing meal. Always super hot, crispy salty fries and quick service at the drive through.

I like all the fast food restaurants specially McDonald s is fastest above all, they have so many employees and easy to proceed food items. The only time you should avoid going to any McDonald s is 3 am to 4 am because they often close lines and premises for maintenance. Otherwise it s all faster than fast and great taste.
I drove an hour and a half from Vancouver, Canada because I heard it was delicious, and it was. Im sorry I didnt take more pictures to show you because I was too busy eating.
The staff are great, always get my order correct and they are fast as well. Food is fresh and all the menu items are always available.

This is the best McDonalds in the city. I am a McDonalds fan and have made a point of going around town to try the same menu items from each and every one I visit. I make a point of going to this one whenever possible. The food is never betrayed by the illusion of the menu pictures... it actually looks nice when you open up the wrapper. No crumpled and soaking-with-grease buns, no dry patties. Staff are friendly and chill, and the dining area is almost always clean and quiet, even when busy. Yes, there are other great McDonalds locations in Vancouver (looking at you 57th and Knight as well as 28th and Main) but for me, this one reigns supreme.
Best drive through McDonalds I ve EVER had. Literally GOURMET quality fries, seasoned McNuggets, like a five star restaurant. Great service too!!!!
They forget my extra ketchup ones every 3 times i visit. They still deserve 5 stars for the hard work Food

I used to live in surrey and stopped going to McDonalds because they would mess up my simple order 90% of the time. This McDonalds is a complete 180. Im pretty sure Im a regular now. Your staff makes every order perfectly, and are very attentive. I dont know what the staff in surrey are doing but they need to take a field trip here.

This is a very biased 5 star review! My wife has worked at a company thats on Annacis Island where this Mcds is, for close to 30 years. We have gotten to know quite a few of the staff. Sure there is turnover of staff but 30 years steady gives one lots of time to get to know alot of new people. Annacis Island has alot of warehousing rather than retail business so clientel is 99% warehouse workers,truck drivers and office staff. So its different in a nice way...lts not that I dont like children or old people..we all will be that ,if we live long enough ,but your not going to see much of them here. So if you want full spectrum of the population go Mcds at Metrotown and youll see what I mean. So no review about the food quality..only the coffee..l love Mcds coffee Haha!  Jim from Vancouver.
10/10 for the teenagers filming tiktoks outside. Truly a wild influencers in the wild kind of moment.
Busy Sunday afternoon. Friendly service at the front counter and food was delivered promptly to our table.
This is the only McDonalds that makes Big Macs right. Just the right amount of sauce and always fast and efficient. Fries are never cold.
Cashier busy on his phone but took my order after all,  food looks cold so I asked to heat up a little bit,  no refills and only a few tables to be seated

Well I was walking to the train to then the airport. I needed snacks and to pee. It was busy but service was fast and food was fresh. But tables were messy and toilet was terrifying dirty. I survived lol made it to my flight never got sick we good.

Cant really rate the service and food as we didnt really eat here. The play place structure is one of the largest in Metro Vancouver. Very clean inside, only downside is there isnt much space for parents to stay to supervise the children (no eating space inside the play place). Food

We are regular customers at this location for about 4.5 years now. Hats off to all the crew members & great management. We ve tried food at other locations too but no other can match the service and food at this 160 location. Thanks everyone to provide us such experience every time it fixes a rough day for us
Great service at this location. They have plenty of parking and drive-through
My go to McDonalds for the wonderful service especially by Sylvie Kid-friendliness: Nice play area for children Food : 5/5 |
The lady that took my order was way above the the average. She was just perfect in every way.
Awesome experience, The girl name Simran, she is really nice. The way of taking the orders, and welcoming customer is great. She is doing a great job.

Some people say go to McDonalds, itll be a dream slice and frankly, thats an incentive. And some day Id love to have a meat sandwich with something other than ketchup attached. I hear in Germany they have discovered how to make burger patties out of insects. Buffalo worm larvae to be exact. When will McDonalds be taking up this practice? Hopefully sooner than later he says, with a mysterious grin! So sir I ask you this: how many cucumbers go in a big mac? Exactly. Point made. Checkmate. Bingo. Olly olly oxen free. That being said, I love this location. Someday I hope to get married here.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 2095 W 41st Ave, Vancouver, BC V6M 1Y7

detailed_reviews.review_text: This may have nothing to do with this McDonald s but I was hoping to get some help from you. I got a parking ticket from this McDonalds parking lot while eating at this McDonalds yesterday. I parked the car and went into the store from the main entrance (not the small entrance thats next to the parking lot) because my friend was waiting for me at that door. I tried to dispute the parking ticket with Royal Parkings and explained the situation, even attached my receipt. The appeal department replied and said as long as I left the parking lot Id need to pay for the ticket. I actually walked straight to the restaurant and spent an hour in there with food and drinks from McDonalds, but still need to pay for the ticket just because I went through a different door? This is not the right thing to do to people in my opinion. McDonald s should have a talk to their service providers when they act like a scammer.
We happened to be here during Family Night (Wednesdays) and the woman running it, Catherine, was so fun and kind. Made my daughters day :) Kid-friendliness: Family nights on Wednesdays
Very cool and chill mall. Many well known brands are here and the mall is under the sky which feels so good to roam around in the summer. Really love this place.
Rich people McDonalds - has comfy couches
Did the drive through. Great service and food quality. It is still great after a month!! Very consistent, BiG MacC is amazing!

Very busy on a weekday but good   staff were amazingly well. Vegetarian options: Yes just ask them. Dietary restrictions: They phill your drinks. Parking: New West lots of seating Kid-friendliness: Lots of kids around Wheelchair accessibility: Yes wheelchair accessibility
Good experience using online coupon thru Mc app
Great service and location. Theyre efficient and do the job right.
We loved the place The food was so yummy especially the macffluries smarties

Sooo  I actually don t recommend this place. The food is unhealthy. Crispy golden fries are bad for you. Tasty beef patties on a sesame bun  are bad for you! Literally everything within the walls of McDonalds is not healthy. But that s not why I eat here!! I give this place 5 star cuz sometimes  Life is rough. Life is busy. Life only has time for a McMergancy!! Not sure why this place gets such low Google score. This McDonald s location has been a pillar of the community for 50+ years. I come here randomly and honestly consider every experience on par or better than most other locations. The only difference I see sitting in the drive-thru line up is the caliber of the vehicles ahead and behind me.
Loud and a rare occurrence of cold food but decent

I wish I knew the name of the drive threw attendant who took our order today because they had the most amazing voice ever and were super great - no confusion or anything, and super clear! I wish them the best on their journey to becoming a voice actor! I had the chills their voice was so crazy
Very well

Food was delicious and fresh. Was not sloppy. Restrooms are really clean and nice. Can get crowded, but it clears out quick. The design of having the drive thru go through the front door is cool, but can make the entrance small and hard to get to. Overall experience was good.

They just reopened after months of renovations and the deck or inside is very tasteful if not upscale  They still have a few more menu specials for 3or4 days and they are one of the only McDonald s restaurants who are open 24 hours in the vicinity of several miles. Even at 2 o clock in the morning this place to stay pretty busy whether the drive-through or the dining areas. On the downside, they only have two cashiers inside to process the walk in orders so they really suggest that you use their mobile app or self-serve kiosk screens.
My go to in Kerrisdale. I love this McDonalds because they are fast and clean and they employee people from different walks of life. It brings me so much joy to see people given opportunities.
This past Sunday the manager Jerome gave me fantastic service. He went beyond his line seeing I was alone attending a toddler and a baby.  Thank you for your understanding and great service.
The food was hot and delicious.  I used the curbside service, and it came quickly from a very pleasant employee
Nice staff, very good air condition
W mans they gave me a free diet coke
Friendly staff and quick drive though, probably the fastest I ve ever been to.

I changed my rating because the manager at west 41st is amazing. everytime hes working the place runs perfectly. hes so on top of everything, and his customer service is impeccable. If i could,  i would vote for him as Prime Minister and Id allow him to deliver my children.   Hes a king.
I am regular for there drive through, considering I make bigger orders and always fast great customer service, and times mistake is made they fixed it right away.
Ive been here a shameful amount of times in the past 3 months and its the best McDonalds Ive been visited to date. Quick and excellent customer service. No mistakes, always friendly.
Always super busy at this restaurant. Orders are quick and food is always hot and fresh

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 3444 E Hastings St, Vancouver, BC V5K 2A6

detailed_reviews.review_text: 1. Conveniently located with many bus routes around. 2. Generous sitting area. 3. Easy drive through window. 4. Large parking lot. 5. Clean washrooms. 6. Quiet with abundant electric outlets. 7. Sitting area with great natural light.
Very well organized.  They aim to get your order done quickly.  As a senior the electronic menu had its challenges, but assistance helped as needed. Very clean and pleasant experience.

Went through the drive through. The gentleman, taking orders and manning the take out window was amazing. Had the best attitude and made me feel extremely happy. I really appreciate service like this after a hard nights work. I forgot to ask his name or I would add it here. Above and beyond.

Sign in the drive through says  drive through closed, order inside  yet the doors are all locked with zero instructions on how to order. Open the app, and curb side pickup and drive through pickup are closed but you can order to pickup inside. Maybe a sign with a set of instructions to follow would make things a little easier.

Conveniently located. Very kind staff in front of the house on this visit (Epiphany 2023). Clean dining room and washrooms. Large enough to facilitate  social distance . Recommended dishes Egg Sandwich in Lettuce Wrap and Tomato

They were busy but we got our order taken quickly, accurately, and the customer service representative was nice, polite, and they spoke flawless English, (a nice change from the usual, can-barley-understand-English) and the food was made nicely instead of a mess you usually have to remake yourself. Overall all this visit was refreshing. Way to go Parking: They have a massive lot thats never ever been filled. Kid-friendliness: They have a great area for children Wheelchair accessibility: They have wheelchair accessible doors on every entrance/exit.

This location is always very busy. For people in a rush, I would stay away from this location at lunch time on week days or weekends. However, with the high traffic, the food at this location is almost always hot.
Cant complain about anything. This venue always gets me the most quality of f&b compared to the others. Only drive-thru is the downside as its too narrow. If you have a big truck, order in store.
Newly renovated dining area. Drive thru very fast. Inside pickup can be slow at times.  Usually a good manager on duty.

People are happy and chill here... Outstanding service as it is for a busy location. Friendly environment for however your feeling. Kid-friendliness: They run around and may be a little noisy, depending on the time. Wheelchair accessibility: Open avaliable doors for wheel chairs.
Friendly staff.  Fast service .. clean store.   Can be busy at times.

I just stopped by with an old buddy at the Cassiar Mcdonalds. We ordered a couple drinks. However I am writing this review to say how great this new worker named Natasha is and her trainer Sophia. Sophia taught Natasha the power of great customer service and up selling. Since Natasha upsold a banana cookie I couldnt refuse so I bought it. Great food, great experience.

Fast, efficient and best part, they know what the BTS meal is (not all locations train their staff on this) and they included everything thats supposed to be in the meal. Yes, meeting basic requirements by giving me what I ordered - not all locations are capable of doing that (looking at you McD on Renfrew and Grandview Hwy).
I met someone in the parking lot to buy gamecube games and it was a pretty good experience as I got a good deal on them. Never tried the food tho
Usually not very busy. Fast and convenient service. The food is fresh. Food : 4/5
Used skip the dishes had it delivered to our room no problems at all my girlfriend ans i enjoyed a nice breakfast in bed together.
Keep coming back to this MD for their te now. Cheapest in town. Quick staff and place cleaner than other locations.

Our drive through employee was an absolute delight. She asked if everything on the screen was RIGHT?! I have never had such good service AND, my order was right, the food was hot and made quickly. Wow.

Very good service. The best McDonald s store in Vancouver in my humble opinion! Not once have I found an order from here unsatisfactory. The only downside is when the drive through is busy, being tan in store customer, the service can be a bit slow.
Had an amazing experience this morning! Would love to recognize Justin for his hospitality and kindness at the window in the drive through. Great way to start off the new year, thank you Justin!

This was my first visit at this location and it was quiet at 12:35pm on a Monday. Ordered 3 cheeseburgers and they were fresh AF. Literally soft pillowy bun, proper ingredient proportions  I will totally come back here.
Great place to take the fam and kick back to eat.
Maybe it was the sweet older lady but fries and coffee were perfect
Very nice place with good crew
Morena get my order and it s really fantastic how she talks to us shes the best customer service that i got.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 891 Granville St, Vancouver, BC V6Z 1K7

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had a break in between my classes so I went to McDonalds to eat something out. I had Mc Junior meal.

The place is very nice, there is a toilet right under Walmart. And there is a feeding table for babies. Its a place that appeals to all kinds of people, they have good drinks and food. Usually a preferred.Thats why its always busy. A place that I would prefer and visit again. Parking: Big and busy place
Excellent food quality, friendly helpful staff, food court dining
Great spot for quick food and drinks!
Good but i would like it more if there are more options in the morning!!! No nuggets in the morning

best mcdonald s i ve ever had ur workers need to be paid more such fresh food and they re dealing with the saturday night crowd lkke some baddies. love this place will be back every weekend lov eu guys.

-Good hot fries and chicken burger. -i changed my order from coke to a root beer and the girl said  Im sure . Whats that supposed to mean? -the washrooms were clean and nice. I smoked a hoot there with no issues. -i wondered if they spat in my fries but no one giggled as I ate them so guess not. -95% girls in the place. Oh so nice. -my food cost me over ten dollars. Not cool!!! -i was late and had to cab home. Also not cool. Another ten bucks. -drug dealing better go well tomorrow or I paint the town red. Spent too much today. -overall it was a good visit to McDonalds.

Service was slower than usual!!! Food was amazing, as always!!! Loved it!!! Kid-friendliness: People dont realize or come to consider that there are kids around and they are cussing and using derogatory language.
McDonalds or not, this was simply a thoughtful gesture... especially during these unprecedented times. A big shoutout to whoever wrote this sweet little memo!

Shout out to the manager that was there when I came in on June 13 around 6:15pm. I d send this review straight to their HO but I didn t keep my receipt. There were two homeless people without masks giving the staff and other customers a hard time, and she handled it like a pro. No hate to the homeless, these two were just making everyone feel unsafe. She took care of her staff and her customers and was still courteous to everyone involved. This location really needs its own full-time security personnel. She should not have had to handle that on her own, or wait for mall security to arrive. Given the location of this McDonald s head office really needs to make sure that there is a security guard on the premises at all times to keep the employees safe. Good job to this woman though - I hope y all are paying her properly for what she has to deal with assumingely everyday.
This Mango and Pine apple smoothie is yum, very refreshing and flavourful.

Absolutely great service, I was in and out very quickly with my meal. The employees were very energetic, and greeted me with a smile on their faces. The restaurant was as clean as your brand new Lamborghini when I entered and as I left I thought to myself, today is gonna be a good day.
You get your order extremely fast.
Nice and modern design. Updated chairs and tables too. It s a bit tight by the ordering area. Staff are friendly and patient with the diverse customers.

I go to many so I dont know which one you are referring to. Generally service is very good and food quality is also very good. I especially love their breakfast wraps. Even though I frequent their establishments quite often, I am not obese or even close to it as many people would suggest to those of us who dine there.

I feel like every kid should work at a place like this at some point in their development. The experience working and communicating with the adult public definitely helps prepare kids for real life. Must be nice
pretty fast even when theyre busy. so you can get on with important things.

I work late nights downtown on the weekend and like to stop here for a snack or coffee on my way home. The entrance is crowded with drunks and drug addicts, inside is packed beyond belief with people yelling, slurring and stumbling. Somehow the staff manage the chaos well. Clearing the lines quickly and pumping out orders in a super timely fashion while still maintaining good customer service. Thank you weekend night shift team!!

The food actually looked as close to those beautiful pictures you see on their displays. The staff was one of the most polite and courteous that I have experienced in a McDonalds in Canada. Thank you McDs!
Gunn and sushi ( from krukshetra ) are the best employees. they are so friendly that they were just like our family friends within first meeting.

This place is at a prime location and always crowded, but surprisingly I never had to wait too long for my food. Its clean and the staff is friendly. The WiFi is also not half bad, considering the amount of devices always connected to it.
Good place.. staff are very good.. I ve never seen this before but a staff member was walking around with a coffee pot and asked me if I wanted a refill on my breakfast coffee. Very nice ..

The amount of homeless people here isnt really a big problem... its McDonalds, do you expect them to buy food from cactus club or something? Props to the employees for having to deal with all kinds of customers from homeless people to annoying and rude customers. If youre complaining about their attitude its a give and take kind of thing. Give them attitude and you get back attitude. Service is on point and the food is good for McDonalds.
Arguably the best fast food on earth, when youre drunk

If between your shopping you or your kids got hungry the best choice is McDonald, always can feed you by a burger nuggets for all budgets, you can buy a lunch for five dollars or maximum thirty dollars, coffee also is so cheap here,  chicken fries with potatoes also available or you can choice special day plate by ten dollars!

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 275 Robson St #211, Vancouver, BC V6B 0E7

detailed_reviews.review_text: I didnt catch the employees name but on Thanksgiving (October 9, 2023) at around 2:30pm a young worker wearing a hat with a bit longer hair in the back and who had earrings was excellent! He was on the serving side and brought my item with a smile. This employee deserves recognition for great customer service.  I will be back again and hope to get this persons name.  Keep up the good work! Edit: The workers name is Daniel.  He was also working at 9:30am on Sunday, October 15th.  Again he provided exceptional guest service.  Its so nice to see such professional, quality service at this location.

I don t usually rate McDonald s but have to on this occasion. We arrived from Mexico on late flight and nothing was open and the very kind and lovely staff helped us order food (in the hours it was to go only) So kind and actually the burgers and fries were also great. Thank you for being kind :)
They always know what I want in my Coffee.  They are  very Respectful and Polite. Cant ask for a better crew in the morning time. Three Cheers for them.
Its an upgrade because the drive thru experience is lovely! Smoothies are what I get. Specialty burgers are better here than other local locations. Well done!

Indeed super fast and busy   great place when you are hungry . Exterior is a little bit dirty . Food and Cigarette butt everywhere  but I will still give 5 stars because I can see everyone work super hard and fast , delivery food right by order . Need more staffs yo take care dinning environment only !
The food is amzing so is the staff the employee amanat was super helpful
The fact that they celebrate moms on their special day is very good. You can see the effort and the food is very tasty, very good service and very friendly
Clean and fast. Kind staff. Good food. Came out hot and fresh.

Small restaurant, but the staff are efficiently fast. Some of the dedicated crew have been there for over a decade. Now thats commitment to service. The food is always fresh, due to quick turnaround sales. Nice patio to hangout in during the summer.
I asked for a lettuce wrap, but they did not have one.
Very nice place

This is the best Mcdonalds I have ever been to. The managers are friendly and customer oriented. The staff is always positive and even remember my name and condiments i would like. I accidentally ordered from the wrong restuarant on the app yet they still fulfilled my order. What a great team.

I visited there yesterday, I ordered Chicken sandwiches, the food was so hot and fresh and the service was very quick even though it was busy. I would recommend everyone to visit this McDonald s, one of the best In the city.
Food was what you expect and no problems with my order.
1 thing these chains generally have... Product CONSISTENCY. When coupled with great service you endup with a food powerhouse.

One of the best McDs in Vancouver. Although its usually super busy, they take orders quickly and hand out the foods fast. They also have kiosks in case youre more comfortable ordering that way. Ive been there many times and Ive never had any problems with my orders.
Really fast! And delicious. Loving the KPOP playing lol.

I get my coffee and muffin here almost every morning and have always found the staff well trained here and friendly.  The restaurant is clean including the bathrooms. It can get busy at peak times, but not unreasonably so.

A place to eat. They are really good on following up on Covid procedures and delivering best of their services as the Canada s fastest restaurant. Correct hot and fresh food, what else one needs. The staff, dining area and patio all of them give me good vibes to be their guest again and again.

Great food super fast service the mcflurry came with so much oreo it was an absolute great experience. There was free wifi inside and even a fireplace stayed in there for a while warming up on a cold winter day.

I have been going to this Macdonalds for over a year now and it is great. All staff are very friendly and expedient. Out of over 200 breakfast meals bought there only once was my order slightly incorrect (3 sugars instead of 3 creams). Keep up the great work.
Always comes here for the quick breakfast, just order ahead on mcdonald s app if you don t want long wait as it located in a busy Robson conner. The staff always nice.
My food was prepared fresh; took care of every detail. This makes me wanna visit them more often. Thanks guys!
i love this place. i visit this place atleast 3 to 4 times a week. crew is very friendly and even started to recognize me and my order

I dont think there is much to say about the food. I have noticed a significant change in service with the installation of the self serve touch screen stands. It seems messier and empty. Maybe its not the stands, but the transition from a family restaurant to a more all inclusive place. Its lost its innocence with no children running around. Or maybe Ive changed. I only go to McDonalds after a heavy night of drinking. Im just seeing all the same people that are hungry and regretful.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 830 SW Marine Dr, Vancouver, BC V6P 5Y8

detailed_reviews.review_text: Lloyd staff who took my order delivered friendly and FANTASTIC service. I had a difficult toddler with me.  Lloyd was understanding, helpful and went beyond his duty of line to lessen my stress with my meal order. Thank you. Will return often.  Store manager please have tables all over wipe often many tables not tidy for customers.

Great little McDonald s with a drive through. Speedy service and though they made a small error with my iced coffee Frappuccino as a hot cappuccino (they sound similar) it was an honest mistake and they quickly replaced my beverage. Friendly and polite team. I would highly recommend this location. Quick drink and nuggets pit stop successful.
A very beautiful area to eat outside, its so cozy! Im absolutely delighted!
Nice outdoor picnic tables outside in the shade if you don t mind the cars of Marine Drive not super far away.

This location is one of the best and most consistent Ive ever visited. Every time I order, I have to customize food due to dietary needs, and they get it right every time. Ive yet to receive an incorrect order, even when its busy. Also staff are very friendly :) great job, folks!
I like this Macdonalds they are very accommodating and friendly in the morning ! Friendly smiles. The food is always freshly prepared and the drive thru line goes by so quick ! I love this place

Good Location, guess they renovate this Mcdonals location just now.Good seating capacity and the staff members arw quite cool. Like other McDonalds location there is no issue of parking if you vist on the rush hours. Clean and great location!
Perfect breakfast sandwich and burgers today. Kudos to the incredible employees
Great customer service! I try not to eat bread, so I ordered my breakfast sandwich on two hash-browns and I understand its confusing, but they did a great job !!
Its your typical burger joint. I have met some of the staff members who are really enjoyable to deal with. They have kept some tasty options that I normally order, but have other treats worth trying.
Good location for me. Has a drive through and pick up. Super convenient, has the usual suspects. Great place if ur having a soft serve. Not the best, bbuuutttt it will satisfy.
Really appreciated the way they treat customers always ready to help and always serve well done food especially Morning and Evening staff really deserve appreciation.

This one is the best yet.  Flavor and temperature are always perfect.  I had an issue with service once and that was fixed immediately as well.  Owner should definitely be praised for running a great ship!
Who ever decided to put the napkins in a little bag is a GENIUS!! I tried the McGriddle for the first time and it was AMAZING!!! Order ID# 430291695

The ladies that work at this location are very attentive and are really great at their job. They remember me every time I come in! A lot of them ask if I need loonies in my change for my laundry. They also know I like the whip cream on the Oreo frappe and will put my medium into a large cup so that theres extra room for extra whipped creamh and sometimes if I have to wait long theyll give me an extra hash brown or whatever to accommodate me. I love this McDonalds!

Had the new Angus beef burger combo. It was better than expected. Came during the dinner hour and it wasnt crazy busy like it is during the daytime. Cooked to order, hot salty fries like I remember. Helpful service.
Friendly staff , quick service

I would rate this a 4, but compared to every other McDonalds experience Ive had, it deserves a 5. Unless you go at popular times, there isnt much of a wait for the drive-through. Staff are all super nice too which is good!

Clean, organised & quick service! Maybe, can the employees smile a little and talk like they arent cyborgs from the future? Ofcourse, I understand that their job is immensely difficult, but a little smile never hurt anyone!

One thing I noticed right away was how clean the store and washrooms were. Didnt have to get buzzed into the washroom to use it. Nice change from downtown Vancouver. Would have no problem recommending this location.

I cant figure out why this McDonalds has so many negative reviews, except of course for sh***y people.  I work around the block from this location and pop in for a daily coffee at the very least.  This McDonalds is clean, the staff is always friendly, and professionalism abounds.  If theres ever confusion at the cash, a supervisor is quick to help out and even quicker with a smile.  Horse meat goop? Flies all around?  Get real guys, its a great place to go.

Usually in and out without have. Fast and friendly too. Clean dining area. Outdoor dining area available but dont usually use it. Free WiFi too. Plenty of parking in parking lot and street parking if for some reason theres no spots available.
Quick efficient and good when busy.
It has yummy food and it is close to the Coast Airport Hotel. Very kind employees.

As like most of the McDonald s have free parking lot this one also have free parking. Their staff are friendly and polite in my experience. This location have walk in & drive through and they even open 24/7 and pretty busy all the times as it is close to marine drive station.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 1055 W Georgia St Suite #120, Vancouver, BC V6E 3P2

detailed_reviews.review_text: It is a nice place. The restaurant opens till 10.30 for in house dining and otherwise it opens 24/7. Must try their vanilla cone, get it even cheaper when you buy using an app. Also try their strawberry pie and iced coffee.
All I got was coffee in the morning four or five times. No nonsense women working here killing it fast and furious. Just have your order in mind before you approach them. They do not take prisoners.

Well-run McDonalds, from what I can tell. Food has always been tasty, and never tasted old. The McDonalds is connected to the Royal Center mall. Outside of the malls hours, theres a seperate door just for McDonalds just off to the side.
Friendly service, especially for the location and being there so late at night.  Awesome location.
Great fries great fillet of fish not so friendly staff the Garbage on the floor was discusting took forever to get it cleaned up people had no choice but to wade through it
Top quality service and food for a very busy restaurant. Some of the franchisees out there should be taking notes
Not forgotten location but the food has always been good. Better staff now everything seems to be going more smoothly
Always busy and gets food out pretty quickly, nice location
Afordable!!!! But love it if the burgers are a bit large at least a medium...! Overall, love it!!
Very clean restaurant and friendly service

Its conveniently located because is between sky train and my school so it is easy to find. When I finish my class, I can go there and buy my favorite burger also the service is pretty good in a few minutes they have your food ready for you to eat at or for go. Finding a available table for eat at is never really a problem. The staff was polite.
Good food, and it s very hygienic place
Wonderful American well known fast food across from the Hyatt Regency, Open 24/7.
Food is always great . Fresh And Hot Food : 5/5
Great service took all my dimes.

I love this place! They have good food, their menu is rich, The chief cook in that spot is very experienced, I love a lot eating all their food. The food is always tasty, the service towards the visitors  is nice. I visit often this restaurant and I not even once was unsatisfied. I recommend this place.
Staff are very efficient and don t forget to smile even with all the pressure.
I enjoyed lunch here so I could watch police build a box around the climate rebellion folks. I sure hope I win something more than a cheeseburger in Monopoly this year!

They dont discriminate  against people who are homeless they treat them like any other  customer and let them use washrooms unlike most A n W stores or Tom Hortons  who will not let homeless or poorer customers use the bathroom  while letting better dressed well off customers use the bathroom  right  infront  of the poorer one they just denied not caring about  the other  persons  feelings or needs at all in fact  actually  making their  discrimination and hatred known often  openly and rudely so.
Mcd is arguably the best fastfood in the world. When youre drunk
When youre super hungry and on your way back from the gym or the health food store this is thee perfect place to sabotage yourself and ruin your insides. It tastes great and the price us right!
Crispy chicken Greek salad was fresh and tasty. I enjoyed eating it more than I thought I would. Way better than salads at subway

I was very impressed when I visited this location it was very clean the staff was very attentive and polite I order was received very quickly it was a delightful experience and I would recommend it to anyone.
It was pretty good. They served fresh food. Which is the best thing I found.
Fast service and pleasant personal

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 5661 Victoria Dr, Vancouver, BC V5P 3W2

detailed_reviews.review_text: Mcdonalds. Classic, always great food. ***NEVER DRIVE TO THIS LOCATION*** Parking lot - very small lot, always full and traffic is terrible so it takes more then 5 minutes to leave the lot once you try and get out of your spot.

I had an out of this world experience with the employee Anson J, he not only understood my order but we sustained a moment where we both combined mutual understanding and both of us connected as peers in a psycological manner.  I have never experienced such flattering customer service with a man <3 Thank you.
McDonalds never goes wrong, order a frappe and fries and u r good to go.

I was really excited for the BTS meal from McDonalds so I went to purchase the BTS meal at this McDonalds which is close to my house and I was served by this Kim Seokjin lookalike his name was Anson J. I cant start at how nice he was to me, he took my order and told me his favourite BTS member and he even gave me extra ice with my drink!! <3 OMG I hope to meet him again in the future :)

Good place. But in general, I dont like food in McDonalds. All food are not worth. It only increases the price and reduce the size and content of food. Its competitors offer better quality and better price. I buy coffee everyday but sometimes I only paid for brown water.
I love the softies over there!
Fun morning crew, clean tables and prompt service, but just don t park here at one of Canada s worst parking lots (I took the bus and you should too).

The space is TINY on the first floor but you can go up the steepest most narrow steps possible to get to the second floor where there is more seating. Despite the small size, this Mc Donald s is located in a small plaza with the tightest parking spots possible. The staff were helpful and friendly although as many have stated, if there s a few people in line you are out the door. There are two self-serve screens inside and a small bathroom on the ground floor. There are also two small tables at the front of the first floor but 5 outdoor tables. There s a sign that says personal reusable cups are encouraged and also a sign outdoors that says outdoor seating is for patrons only. However I saw many sitting here enjoying their non-Mc Donalds lunch. I liked seeing people utilize their outdoor seating and the community feel it brought so bravo for allowing others to sit and use your tables, I really liked seeing this and 5 stars and this review just for that.
The ice cream here hits different
the worker tried using marketing skills against me when i was deciding on what i wanted. Best experience in any fast food chain.
Great location with lovely staff. Despite being in a small space, everything was orderly and my meal was prepared quickly and promptly. I drop by this location almost weekly for a quick coffee break.

Im here most days, and the service is fast and reliable. I have witnessed on menny occasions when someone has dropped their stuff on the way out the door, on falt of their own or someone else, the staff will gladly rehook them back up with all they have lost in the accident. I know a lot of the staff on a first name basis and they enjoy their jobs and the customers that come to this location. Im glad to have met a lot of the younger, and older staff members of this location.
I always love getting my Angus Burgers. I find them so filling.  Plus I also love to get my coffee from there as well. Not to mention their Blueberries Muffins.

Idk what these ppl r talking about, I always see multiple people sent out to clean tables and the floor, and the food is always fresh for me, its small because the other stores are there which restrict the buildings ability to expand, dont complain just because we cant remind you of your trip to Gordon Ramsay restaurant.
I will definitely be coming back to this place. Price is very reasonable and shes very friendly.
Very very good
Quick Service and very Friendly staffs. The manager is very nice and polite too.
Been to their location twice on this trip and both the staff and management are fantastic!  Very friendly and helpful.
ordered coffee. Came within a minute and tasted great
Nice staff and quick services
Most people say this is a bad McDonald s but they also say the DRIVE THOUGH give s really BAD Service the is that there is no DRIVE THOUGH
There was somebody salting the sidewalks ahead of the snow....Really organized and Nice people working there! One of the best McDonalds location in the city!
They work so fast in there my goodness
Its a McDonalds. Small, limited seating inside. Lots of tables outside.
Excellent customer service today. The manager, Benjamin is the coolest dude ever!  :)

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 808 Marine Dr, West Vancouver, BC V7T 1A1

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently was driving through McDonalds and I was lucky enough to be served by Kash. Her professionalism and kindness were truly exceptional, Kash efficiently took my order with a smile, ensuring that every detail was perfect and her commitment to providing excellent service was evident throughout.
The Burger or more specifically. My double big Mac was very tasty. And the french fries were fresh. For some reason the meat in West Vancouver was a lot more tasty
I always bring the kids I babysit here, and they love it! The staff is very responsive and the food is of good quality. Satisfied.

The manager yells at you if you dont stand behind the tape lines and she yells if you try and go out thru the wrong door. 80% of the tables are closed off for sanitary reasons, yet the open tables are always filthy. Teenagers get kicked out for loitering and theres a homeless guy who hangs around outside everyday around lunchtime

Fast and friendly service. Pickup is usually speedy but can be busy. The food is prepared properly and orders are infrequently mixed up. Restaurant is decent sized and not typically busy. All in all a decent McDonalds.
Clean bathrooms and they got my customized order correct on the first try! Very quick and efficient, this is a good location.

Most McDonalds restaurants are pretty standard but this one was just a bit different. There was a young lady with short blue hair working in the payment window for the drive through.. she was awesome! She was so clear, pleasnt and efficient and something about the way she spoke was quite calming... which was great because I had three kids with me - two of which were arguing and the other one was screaming. I just felt like Id like to give her a little thank you. The food was great.. burger looked like one on the commercials which doesnt happen often in my experience. The kids loved their meals and devoured them.. but what kid doesnt? It was a nice treat for them. Thanks, guys, for saving me the chaos of whipping together a late dinner.
Came on drive thru today in the evening, i was not sure what  to order but then the girl taking the payments and order together helped me soo much her name was Cash, great service. Thanks,

One of my favorite breakfast places. I love the breakfast burrito with extra salsa and the sausage mcmuffin with egg. If Ednas there shell have your order processed so fast. She remembers your previous orders like a computer.
Friendly supervisor in early mornong  at  6:45am

Entire staff is very efficient and very respectful here but Anjali Mani is one of the best worker here, she knows exactly what is real customer service. Infact i will say this Mcdonald location is the best in Vancouver.
Very nice workers who work here
Morning crew here is always fast and very friendly.

Pretty happy with this McDonalds. I had just bought a peppermint mocha at the Burrards location when I got on the bus towards Park Royal. Unfortunately, the employee gave me some kind of watered down coffee that tasted nothing like it was supposed to. They probably forgot the syrup? I only found out once I got on the bus. I stopped by this location to ask if they could replace it. I was planning to buy a new one if they refused, but was happily surprised when they agreed to simply give me a new one. Great customer service! Thank you :)

It is a life saver,  when I am in a rush and super hungry and  if no time for the parking, it is so convenient to go to their drive through, it is very fast they are super friendly. May be that one is only the McDonalds I am having my meal. Location is great very convenient to get in and out.
Im loving it Parking: Free parking Food : 5/5 |
Great McDonalds to pull if your on the road.  Theyre are very fast and consistent too.  Cant recall ever having a bad experience with them over the years.
Dining room open at 5am (and not yet packet with the grey hair crew) Clean bathrooms and the food was even good ;)
Hadnt had one of these in years, but saw the special for a $3 Big Mac Lol
THIS PLACE IS VERY CLEAN :) The staff is friendly, and service is fast. Bathrooms are very clean.  Hand sanitizers are available. Love this McDonalds
We went for a happy meal. The service team were good and we got our order in less than a minute!
Very very good foods

One of the only places in West Vancouver (if not the only place) to get food around the clock, 24 hours. The staff are generally always nice and theres parking galore if you dont fancy the drive through.
Good customer service and food. Would come again.
My brother Gerry Chin had a live cow in his burger! He is now dead cuz of you. THANK YOU SO MUCH

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 1219 Marine Dr, North Vancouver, BC V7P 1T3

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice ambience and the place is clean. The parking lot has free 90 mins parking. Drive through is 24 Hours. Staff is courteous but the orders can get busy.

Im only reviewing this for people that know McDonalds... As far as they go., this one is clean and fast... Even though it was after midnight and seemed busy when we arrived.  Probably 7 cars ahead of us and we still got through in minutes.  Pretty good when you need something after a long night.

So never thought to give a review for McDs but I pass by this one everyday and happen to see this sign.. We tried it out and I was very pleasantly surprised. So the happy meal was pretty standard so nothing to add here..but they gave us crayons to color and to top it off offered to let my kids make their own sundaes after the meal.. Let s just say this was well received..
McDs deluxe spicy crispy chicken... D-licious. Its Micky Ds - enough said.

Umm, its McDonalds. They invented the whole franchise thing. If you go to a McDonalds you get McDonalds. A big Mac is a big Mac is a big Mac. The ice cream machine is down, but theres apple pies to burn your face off.
Grabbed a couple of cheese burgers and fries. I was a bit shocked at the cost. But then everything has gone way up in price. An older woman took my order and was very polite.

This Mcdonalds location is better if you go in and get your order.  Rather than the drive through area. My husband never gets the right order? So  we go inside to either eat in or takeout our order is never wrong this way. Very quick and very nice and courteous Employees. Also very busy if you ever watch them from inside? Food is always fresh and hot. if your not happy with the meal, they will give you fresher fries and burgers, or whatever?  you might have to wait a few minutes? but it is worth the wait. My husband and i prefer going inside now rather than the drive through. We recommend this Mcdonalds.
Great welcoming friendly staff, fresh food

McDonald s breakfasts are good. I especially like the traditional bacon egg muffin. It is interesting but somehow their coffees are super great and even much better than some of these franchise coffee places. I also like McDonals ice creams, if you haven t tried them out go for them.
Always quick service and a solid menu to choose from. I come a couple times a week. Staff are polite and affable.

Traditional McDonalds food in a modern building. Good location and plenty parking spot features this store. The service is usual and friendly. Clean restaurant although I never checked the toilets. Could be busy in peak times but no major lineups.
Kiren, is the greatest customer service representative I have ever met! She would serve you regardless of anything! 5 starts! Would recommend to everyone!
Always so quick! It is nice to see friendly smiles at 7 in the morning.
The fastest way to have a delicous meal.
Best McDonald ever Manager in charge is super friendly. My burger is well stack, and the bun is hot. All of my order are delivered within two minutes.
It was more busier this morning due to the power outage that affected the neighborhood. The team at McDonald s worked very hard and did an amazing job. Great team work. The food came out hot.
It was a bit slow tonight! Due to having lots of customers. Usually they are so fast
Fast and good training with customers
Drive thrust are all busy line went quick order was done properly and the food was hot - the best that you can expect from McDonalds
We were in drive thru line for half an hour at 11 pm! Was quite busy but the service was fast...
I would say this location is consistent in delivering a good product and are efficient at processing them.
Awesome service, they measure your feet length and width to get the boots with the best comfort.
The guy at the drive thru greeted me like a friend he hadnt seen in a long time. Honestly best McDonalds experience Ive ever had.

Ordered through the McDonalds app, used one on my deals and for 2 of us it was just over $10.00. Dietary restrictions: Will accommodate your dietary needs. Parking: Big parking lot, easy to maneuver. EXCEPTIONS: Lunch rush gets a bit crazy, popular place to go! Kid-friendliness: Kids meals, no playground though. They are getting harder to find. Wheelchair accessibility: Yes, everything is one level.
Food

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 7289 Knight St, Vancouver, BC V5P 2W9

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great location. Small in size but cozy. Few old Hong Kong men always occupy tables very long time and talk about how do they love China and criticize Canada government. But you can forever see them staying there, Canada but not China. What a fantastic view

The last 2 times ordering food, we were given a number to display on the table. Our food was served to us at the table. I am going to assume seniors and any other customers needing a little extra help are offered this service. Nice touch McDonalds.
Very peaceful and nice place to have a breakfast or just to sit and chill for a while

I came here to order on the last day of 2022 and was taken by surprise of how friendly and kind the staffs were. The worker, i think her name is Miracle, took my order and was extremely helpful and kind. She really made my day.
asked for a sundae with caramel in the middle and the top, and the employee delivered perfectly. would recommend this place
Food quality  is good but the services  has been little  bit slow maybe i went at mc busy hours  . Vegetarian options: Mc vegge
I am from skip the dishes Very friendly and quick serving staff specially helpful Anu ,Thanks Anu for the awesome experience !!

Looks like this restaurant has hired awesome employees. Went there after so long. Really impressed by their customer service. Specially by cashier Aerial (don t remember exact spelling  ). Keep up the good work guys.

Visiting this location was very enjoyable. The service was excellent , fast and friendly. However I must add this comment to my review of this location because the staff here deserve it to be said..... without a doubt this McDonalds restaurant is the cleanest fast food restaurant that I have visited , and  Im including all fast food restaurants that I have visited not just the McDonalds corporation , and not just burger restaurants. Ive never smelled bleach upon entering the washrooms. Its really appreciated to know that the staff here putting in the extra effort.

Although this location is lacking a drive thru and more parking spaces they made up for it in service.  The manager taking orders was pleasant and very efficient. The team worked well inside and orders came out quick.
This was a fast speedy breakfast on the go.  Hotcakes were hot and so was the hashbrown.  Mmmmm double double  coffee.

My favourite location to go to since a very long time. Since I work close by I end up buying some lunch. The new kiosk have made it a lot more simpler and its even better if someone just orders straight from the app. Great staff, ways friendly and they offer fast service
This McDonald is amazing. The staff here are well organized, clean and extreamly friendly. All other McDonalds should send their employees here for training. Have a good day my friend!

Standard McDonalds on the corner of busy intersection; limited parking in the rear and no drive through. However, the service at this location is very good. Has all the standard fare of McDonalds. All COVID precautions being observed currently.

In my opinion this is the best McDonalds in the south Vancouver area. However when its busy, everything gets messy and you may experience some delay or mistakes in your order (which is the case everywhere). In general if I want to grab a bite or coffee when I am in that area, this would be one of my first options as its convenient and has reasonable prices. Also if you drive, it has drive through and free parking. Remember to check the McDonalds mobile app for offers!
I visited so many times customer service is really good today I visit to eat there is manager here I dont know about her name but shes really nice she treat me a very nice way    lots of love for her
Gran servicio al cliente!! Spectacle as always, Cookies and Muffin are SCRUMPTIOUS, flavourful.
Woman in the white uniform in the morning  never fails to serve above and beyond and additionally make a customer smile. I highly recommend coming in the morning hot and ready meals constantly.

Good service, friendly staff. Although its McDonalds, the food I got the other day was well thought-out with all the ingredients and amount of sauce. I guess the cook in kitchen that day  really loves cooking.
Delicious sushi for a great price! Place is pretty busy so be prepared to wait a bit. Lots of selection as well,plus the tempura isnt too greasy!
