Fast reliable service at this one. I eat here once a week at least and they havent got anything on my order wrong yet. Usually fresh
Love this location, I just live 5 minutes away. Always good to have a discounted big mac.
great place for family outings
Substituted fries with proutine for my combo. But still got fries instead. But it s all good. Still better than starving to death at 3:52 in the morning.
I really love this place. Tons and tons of food to choose and I couldnt even choose what to eat. Its an amazing place, cashier peeps are friendly. I definitely recommend you to check this place out.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 1366 Main St, North Vancouver, BC V7J 1C6

detailed_reviews.review_text: This location is always prompt and has great friendly staff. I enjoy the drive-thru experience here. The food is always cooked right, very rarely disappointed. They don t ding you for bags and cups and pocket the money. The only negative that I really have is that they never, ever, ever put condiments in your bag. You always have to ask for everything and when you re in a hurry, One often forgets to ask. It is especially bad when they bring it to your car, then you have to go inside to get ketchup anyway. Would be really great if they fixed that.
Typical McDonalds not overly busy staff sometimes makes counter orders wait best to order by app and have delivered to avoid the waits with exception of drive thru.
Omfg I got the freshest filet-O-fish in my life. It was so fresh my mouth got burnt.
Im actually impressed with this McDonalds.  The food is ALWAYS good & hot. They rarely ever forget anything & They have such friendly staff. I usually request fresh and they bring it out.

Definitely 5 golden stars .. Im wondering why I used to get charged around 12.50 $ for 2 cheese burgers meal with large fries and drink on marine and main Street location, and another location on north vancouver charging me 16 dollars for the same order,
Forgot an item, wrong drink. By the time everything was corrected, food was cold. Burgers, chicken wrap and nuggets were cold and poorly put together.

My favorite McDonald s. I come here every week. I know sometimes they missed 1 or 2 items for my order (like all McDonald s do), but they fix it after explaining. Sometimes I wait for 15-20min for my order on Friday night or Saturday  too, I know they are busy. I m getting used to check my order before I leave. Staff are great too. Nice to see some students working here, fast and friendly.

I brought my daughter here so she could get an after school snack. Shes a little shy so I encouraged her to let the teller know what she wants to order...despite how busy they were at the time the staff member was extremely patient with my daughter-thank you!! Food is to be expected.
The only negitive was they didnt put the french fries in the bag
Best coffee and latte and the best prices

#order #unsalted    get fresh. #tbt #photooftheday #picoftheday #loveit #me #sale #sweet #freshhotfries are the best... #THIRSTY #great #loveit............... #BEAUTIFUL #VANCOUVER  #love #VANCOUVER #Island #people #loveit

My husband and i Love this location. Our order is always correct here, and the food is always fresh and Hot. We usually go through drive through and sometimes go inside and order and take it to go. There never is a long wait either way. Employees are always friendly and greet you. They have some great savings coupons out right now, it is September 2021 good until October 2021. We use them when there available? We noticed the the 2 can dine for $.9.99 coupon is now 2 for $12.99 . But that still is a lot of savings.  its a clean Restraunt if you choose to eat in? they also have a couple of outdoor table and chairs. Drive thru orders And car service they have you drive to the side at the parking lot and they deliver it to you. Awesome. Mcdonalds Employees and food.5 stars
Order error on customer side. Prev customer paid and took my order. All staff apologetic and super friendly. Then they ensured my order was correct. Would come here again and would recommend

They tried their best. I was a passenger with someone in the drive through. The person was so rude to the young girl. She kept her own. Great job young lady. For that guy, he is no longer in my friend circle.
This was one of the few times McDonalds breakfast has ever been perfect. The hashbrown had that fresh oil taste. Nailed it

Very busy place, decent service. They know what theyre doing, they park people instead of having them wait in line, and Carry Out their food where theyre parked. I wish more McDonalds locations would learn this feature

Great location McDonalds always got good food I know they do a lot of R&D, to maintain that. Additionally in this trying times that we are living in I have noticed that they have hand sanitizer call Ang always have someone wiping down high traffic touch areas. Also theyre always wearing masks. These things helped to make you feel safer

As I sit at my table awaiting the arrival of the custom ordered sandwich I have created on the futuristic new touch screen they have in the lobby a pleasant young man named Keith introduced himself as my server. This came as a surprise to me. He brought me the drink of my choice and and later on the delicious burger I had earlier concieved. It was delicious, it tasted like a pub style sandwich. Very happy with my experience

Favorite location to grab a snack. Plentiful parking options and has a drive through, if short on time. Lots of shops in the surrounding area, if you are feeling adventurous, or need something specific.
Very good service compare to other MacDonalds. Drive thru ppl are much politer here. Good training done.
I do a Big Mac Combo say once every couple of months. Totally hits the spot!
Fast drive thru, friendly staff, clean interior and they have yet to mess up a grill order in my years of patronage. What else can you ask for!
Loved the new mctaster sandwich. I also love their junior chicken and mcdouble. My order comes out just right every time.
Its a McDonalds, there isnt much more to say except that the service at this one is great, always fast and.polite and try have yet to muss up our orders.
Comfy seats. Service that is accurate, fast, and friendly

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 2570 Commercial Dr, Vancouver, BC V5N 4C1

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good location, very tiny McDonalds. Strange smell all the time at exactly this location. Coming to all chain quite often and no noticeable smell, but this place has specific smell. Service friendly and supportive, thanks to the staff. Automatic order Machine working fine, order TV screen working as supposed to be. I think if youre comparing to Alberta all McDonalds in BC working great - Im still shocked. If youll find source of smell and reduce it, big improvement guaranteed. Good place for getting your fast food. pc: for those using app, large iced coffee offer is just 1$.

Small cafe, very pleasant service, quickly ordered coffee and chicken hamburger, muffins. Its very tasty and positive. The downsides are dirty tables and floors, a lot of garbage and an overflowing trash can right next to the tables, which was not very pleasant. We wiped our own table and sat for quite a long time. At the end of our meeting, workers came and removed everything from the trash can. We may have stopped by during their lunch hour, lets try again. But the kitchen itself was clean and the workers were in clean clothes. Well come back again, maybe it will be cleaner. In any case, thank you, there was nothing stopping us from sitting and talking over coffee.

Good, fast service and friendly staff, but thats not what makes this McDonalds rise above the rest. There hasnt been a time that Ive gone to grab a coffee at this McDonalds and they WERENT playing NSYNCs Merry Christmas, Happy Holidays over the speaker. And Im writing this at the end of April. I love the unfaltering devotion to the holiday season, even as we move into the summer. As a lover of Christmas AND 90s boybands, this McDonalds cant be beat.

A huge THANK YOU to the Manager Lady who was empathic and who found time to help me today when my phone was stolen from the table where my kids were playing and waiting for the food I went to get at the counter. The phone will probably not be found but I appreciate her effort to do everything in her power to help me while being busy with her own work. This is also a warning for other customers to closely watch their personal belongings at this location!!
Excellent costumer service. First time to be here January 19, 2023 @12:24 pm, the lady seems to be Filipino is so nice and welcoming customers so warm. I wanna go there again for sure.
Got there at 4pm not that busy, redeemed 2000 points for a free coffee.  Tables were all clean and I enjoyed a window seat, half full.
One of the cleanest McDonald s I ve seen in a long time , hard working staff .
I have ordered Large Fries. They are delicious & fresh. Restaurant was clean. Workers were nice.
A small mcdonald but great food
I came here at 3am and ordered a strawberry milkshake. I m not sure who the girl who made my orders name was but it was the best milkshake I ve had. Keep on rocking.
Very fast service despite being a very busy location. Food came out hot and toasty.
Love the chrunch of fresh food.
WiSh iT wAz biGgEr tHouGh , hARd tOo sit wiTh a sTroLLer in the pLaCe

Small location makes distancing layout a challenge during peak times for some customers. The staff are doing an above / beyond job, always cleaning and sanitizing things! I ve always had a great experience from the staff at this location.

This MacDonalds is VERY conveniently located because it s not even a block away from the Commercial-Broadway sky train station. The service is quick, friendly and efficient and every time I have ordered food at this location it was fresh and at its best. I have no complaints. ***IF YOU FOUND THIS REVIEW HELPFUL KINDLY  LIKE  IT***

Fast service, very polite & pleasant staff, even at 6:00 am which is a hard to pull off in a very busy store with a variety of customers all trying to get their foid/drink ordered and be on their way.....
The food is consistent. Never a dull moment at the Broadway and Commercial location, this week a guy just randomly punched and broke the glass door on his way out.

This is located right next to a bus stop on Commercial Drive. Its a decent size sitting area but mostly its crowded even in late nights. Id recommend if you use touch screen order menu for fast service. The washroom is very busy. And naturally its very hard to clean when theyre busy most of the time. You will notice people struggling with the door because they are not sure its locked from inside or staff locked it. Its a good place to go but my personal choice will be a pizza shop as Im on Commercial Drive which is famous for Italian food.

One of the best Mickie Ds in Van as the place is always  chock full of exciting clientele but its usually the most turnt up on weekends during 11pm-1am. One time I saw a gentleman dressed as a cowboy throw his hat on the ground because they didnt have strawberry milkshakes! Im yet to eat at this location but have heard the food is so so.
Their new menu add-on (ranch souce) goes so well with the chicken nuggets. Kid-friendliness: They have kid friendly items on the menu. Food : 5/5 |

the young man, Darian, who works cashier during the day is an absolute pleasure. Very polite, speaks very clearly, and ive watched him stay very calm with challenging customers and deal with issues appropriately.  Always happy to be served by him when I come in for my daily coffee!

How is it not to bad considering ts location the people who go there are moztlyhhunry or...have to use the bathroom.The staff are considerate much more then the staff were at the location on 41st...&Kingsway...I stood in line for 33 minutes while the staff their ignored and disrespectd  calls from the overly patient customers...after midnight its a gong show

This is a smaller McD near the Broadway Commercial intersection. Same menu as in other McDs. Good friendly service. Convenient for commuters wanting a quick coffee or a?meal Parking can be very limited at times.
Small store next to SkyTrain station. Have 2 touchscreen kiosks but the girl serving Friday evening was friendly and efficient so used counter service.
Service with a Smile  , Curtious and Fast. Had my GlutinousMcMaxter in a seat in no time. Clean and plugged in to power and WiFi.    .... LOVIN IT.. Dont those Golden Arches look like  ,, naaa.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 3308 W Broadway, Vancouver, BC V6R 2B2

detailed_reviews.review_text: 3rd time visiting Vancouver, a small gesture that goes far but coming from a party at 2am I came to McDonald s, I ordered a milkshake and got a small instead of a medium I ordered and asked nicely if it wouldn t be trouble to give me a different size (wouldn t have minded pouring into a different cup) the young man who helped me got me a new milkshake, and let me keep the small. I pushed and said that it was wrong to take it, but he insisted it was no worries. i hope the rest of his shift and night went well, and that I truly appreciated it! :)
I dont normally eat in McDonalds because their restaurants are dirty and every surface sticky but this one is clean and the service is fast. Even the soda machine is clean, which is never the case

This Location very busy as it serves a community as well as the bars and entertainment venues around the area.  Seems popular with UBC students as well as the university is just down the street. Service is not as tight as you would expect for such a busy location, but okay. There is parking underground with a stairway directly into the restaurant. Then best feature is that it is 24hr.
A good fast-food place when you are in a hurry to eat something in between appointments
Love it! Specially for breakfast!!! Hashbrown I know it is supper junk, but hands down most delicious junk food
Good location with lots of seating space and friendly staff.
Overall, it was a good experience and its 24 hours open.
The Ghost Pepper Sandwich is Magnificent! Keep it on the Menu!
Friendly staff, foods are hot and fresh. The dining area was clean as well. As a fast food place, they deserve a five.
Ordered take out sandwiches and coffee

Doubles as a homeless shelter because this city expects business to pick up the slack where their left wing utopia policies fail.  Food and staff are great, but be careful if you come at night you may very well encounter a handful of scary schizophrenic people hanging around that the city just dumps here.

The young workers at this site worked super hard to process our order.  They were prompt, efficient and professional.  Given the nastiness of this pandemic and the strict guidelines these folks are following, this seems like a thankless, stressful job.  Thank you for your hard work - we appreciate you.
Always busy. Staff are great under a lot of pressure. Lots of take out ordered from this location. Wait times are reasonable..

First time I would use meticulous to describe a McDonalds but this one worthy of it! They even have carnations in little vases on the tables! The layout is just right not too many big stuffy seats. I visit mostly mornings for coffee. Granted the food is standard McDonalds but it shows the staff cares about the establishment.
This place is always busy as it gets. Good place to hangout with friends for a chat.Clean and organized as well. Staff were so busy.
Very nice and friendly service. Big Mac meal was excellent and hot. Easy parking in behind from the alley, in underground parking. Parking: Underground off alley way.

For Christmas my husband and I decided to create care packages to hand out to the homeless on Christmas Day. We stopped by this McDonald s location and spoke with the manager Ferdi about including gift certificates, and he also extended ten free Big Macs to us. What a blessing it was to meet Ferdi. His generosity and kindness will help to make Christmas special for people who may not have a meal on Christmas Day. If you read this review Ferdi, thank you and God bless you.
The staff and the food at this location are very good. Way better than the McDonalds on 4th! Also the restaurant and bathrooms are kept reasonably clean,

I hadnt eaten McDonalds in literally 10+ years. But then I stopped in here bc someone in our group wanted to go. I got a Big Mac and nuggets and a soda. This basically kickstarted my addiction and Im in full relapse now. I secretly eat McDonalds all the time. Oh and this location has a walk-up window with a fully automated order delivery chute. Pretty cool to see.
Updated McDonald s. Looks clean. My 5 yr old likes the indoor play space. Air conditioning is very cold in there. There is always someone cleaning at this McD s

Kids meal is a terrific value: 4 chicken nuggets, fries, yogurt, juice, plus toy (5 items) for an amazing $5. The play place on Broadway kitsilano is pretty limited but if there are other kids there, especially rainy days,  then always fun for little ones.
McDonalds is great because they let you use the washrooms, that is why you retrieve the effort by purshqsing over there cheap food and great desserts
My icecream was tasty. And the machine was working!
Fast service and always gets my order right. The staff is awesome and always quick to service the customers coming in. Mobile orders are the done quick and always ready.
Its Mc Donalds, you get what you get but the staff at this location are always super friendly, this location is always clean, and they are rarely out of things, machines are rarely down.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 86 W Pender St #1001, Vancouver, BC V6B 6N8

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ordered on the app while I was at the Waterfront Centre location and it switched to this location without me noticing. I called this location and right away the person on the phone offered to call Waterfront McDonald s and have them make what I ordered there. I appreciate it!

They are very quick with your order and the food was good. I love the McDonalds reward program. Sometimes when I need a deal its perfect for the time. And their deals on game day for big macs for 3$ plus tax is a super deal. Thanks McDonalds.
Enjoyed my mcnuggets with sweet n sour sauce
Fast service even at lunch time
This McDonalds is fast and you get  great service

This is where we rock n roll   like a mothaf*cka Vegetarian options: Dont order any of the burgers unless its beyond meat   if your a vegan. Pancakes,fries, waffle fries are an option Dietary restrictions: Peanuts and fish allergens Parking: Theres parkade across the street Kid-friendliness: People bring kids here all the time but theres no place to play unlike the other McDonalds in the area. Wheelchair accessibility: Ground level so no need for a ramp inside the mall theres a ramp

This location has very lovely and kind employees! I admit I was on my last dollar before pay day so I bought a $1 coffee that was on promotion. I hadnt used the McDs app before, and the girl at the cashier kindly helped me find the right spot to scan for my $1 coffee promo. I was short 5 cents, which was awkward, and she told me it was okay. I mean, this is in a rough area of town and they must deal with all manner of people, but her professionalism and kindness was amazing. I also like this location, because its close to where I live. Ill be going out of my way to order food here when I feel a McDs craving and Ill be paying the kindness forward very soon. Good work, West Pender McDs! :)
Staff are very patient and friendly and helpful
I get my boy nuggets here everyday because theyre fast and if they take too long they gave me a free large fountain pop.

Very good service. Theres this staff named Amelita who served us. Shes so friendly, accommodating and polite. Shes one amazing person that all foodchains need to have...to make customers keep coming back to that lication.

I love the ice cream, social aspect, and the quality of life which tends to be around there. I would like to see a change, for the bathroom to be accessible during the whole day that their restaurant is open for business. The mall bathroom is far away when you are eating your food.
Good food cheap price and fast.
This is a place that knows what service is all about courteous and friendly staff the menu choices have really taken a turn for the better happy to give this a five star rating
Quiet but good overall
quick eats on the way home, very satisfying
The morning crew is kind and quick. Food was fresh and served with a smile!
Mmmm ice cream

This McDonalds on pendry in Chinatown is one of the worst McDonalds I have had the pleasure of eating at the burger looked like something fell out of the garbage it was so messy definitely will not go back there it was like that more than once and both times it was the same
Best manager Harman op  she is so humble nd   cute
The staff are very warming to all of the customers. The unique personalities which come in and out of here makes for an interesting experience.
Some cute ladys work there
They always have good meals at McDonalds. The meals are tasty, cheap, and fast to make. I go to McDonalds at least once a month.
I dont hate this place and why would I the food was Great and so was the service
Beautiful scenery wild wild country water is so clear. Nature scenery big mountain s rivers and creeks
Fast and friendly service. Food was made to satisfaction

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 5728 University Blvd #101, Vancouver, BC V6T 1K6

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place is okay and they do try but it just gets backed up a lot when its busy. It can take a while to get your order and they are also slow for DD, UE, or Skip orders. Its clean though, I do see them cleaning regularly whenever I go here.
Nice and fast service, there is a clean bathroom and kindly staff
Always standard taste ...and they are offering a regular fries free if you order online..good deal for a 6 dollars purchase...
it s a busy store but the phi tall asian lady manager had a good handle in a given situation, i was just amaze how she handled it
it s a mcdonald s. it s open 24/7. gives you what you wanted. also works with mobile app. pretty def explanatory, i go here a lot when i m out late studying and everything s closed
Very busy but always gets my orders right

Can be a little busy given its right across the university but so far no complaints! Ive gotten my food at a reasonable amount of time and the staff seemed nice but Ive mainly used the kiosk to order. Convenient for a quick lunch! Recommend using the McDonalds app to get offers!
if you ve gone to a UBC party, you know this place
I just love the customer service of Line jn this restaurant      the way she greet    is awesome

The staff work really hard in this place. Theyre open 24/7 and serve mountains of customers. They are also the busiest restaurant for food couriers in UBC. You might not get your food quickly, because they have 500 orders. Just be patient, try to avoid going at busy times, and be polite! I always get my order correct and only seldomly had to wait very long (Due to those rush times, not their fault) 10/10 I still grab a burger now and then for fast eats
Great service, food was good.
I am glad they are open 24/7 friendly professional staff , thank You Devyanka , Apita,  loochanmeet, Raghav.... Thank You Best Management in Town Food

The MVP of my post-secondary education; a 24/7 haven that was there for me when I was young and finding my way. I ll look past the 15 McPounds it contributed to my waistline in first year and instead focus on the positive memories. Smile because it happened, right? - Served me McNuggets when a boy turned me down at the frats, sodium was a tad heavy that time, but could ve been my tears. - Became my second dinner after a 5-star Gastown restaurant couldn t fill me up. - Took a nap in one of their booths and used their free wifi to submit an essay. McDonald s food is the same everywhere ok, so let s talk about the staff serving drunk young adults on a Friday evening and never coming close to a meltdown. Sounds like bulletproof service to me. Easy 6 out of 5 stars for this joint. The local business we don t deserve.

**the music was fixed** The loud music in the kitchen that competes with different music in the small dining area is pretty unbearable. They seem to get away with it because most of the customers are just students grabbing and leaving but how anyone can bear to sit and eat is beyond me.

This is a fairly used facility around campus.  It meets McDonalds standards as far as Im concern. Service is quick and food does slide down the throat quite easily. People like Presee, Maria and others make a pleasant experience.

Food here is not whats being reviewed. As far as McDonalds go, this is a great one. Very efficient team. The morning crew is top notch in their service. Its busy at times but this is a well managed McD. Clean. No drama.

Its without a doubt that this branch of McDonalds is the best in Canada. With quick and proper services, your expectations will always be exceeded. Given their background, one that stood out the most was a guy named Einer. With a pleasant smile and personable attitude, this guy will keep you comfortable and welcome whenever you visit. I hope people like Einer will continue to serve customers at this branch because I know damn well hes doing the store proud.
Food quality improve a lot!  Spacious and neatly clean.  Parkings are ok.  Kids have playground to enjoy.  I think McDonalds is still the best place to bring the kids with.

I grew up on McDonalds because my family was lower middle class and my dad thought McDonalds was the only way for my brother and I to survive puberty. Well I guess I dont have heart disease so theres that going for me. Very nice food. 5/5

Stop complaining idiots. This is a very busy place at times. Especially late nights Wednesday Friday Saturday. Drunk UBC students eat here on those nights. Place is crowded with a bunch of stupid drunk students who acts tough even though there not. Customers should stop being an idiot and complaining and just be nice and wait for their food. Employees work hard here, actually all mcdonalds employees work hard. If youve worked at mcdonalds before, you will understand what Im saying.

Not the cleanest place but also its a macdonald so you cant expect much more. There is always something missing with my food everytime I order from here but It could also be because how busy it is as a restaurant.

everyone I came into contact here was way nicer than any other   experience with mcdicks.  I tried the new self serve station and there were workers there to help the process. I couldnt figure out how to add extra pickles though...
Super service , and fries   with swirl Ice cream My top recommendation and Top choice !
Average McDonalds. Very busy at 1 am. McFlurry good.
Poor workers put up with probably thousands of drunk students coming by at 2am and manage to function incredibly well under pressure

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 1965 Powell St, Vancouver, BC V5L 1J2

detailed_reviews.review_text: Used the drive through most times, once in a while I stopped in for dining in when I used to work around the area. Its an express location so it has only three dining tables. Kid-friendliness: Kids menu available Wheelchair accessibility: The wheelchair accessible entrance is in front and has a very small dining area may cause a problem if you want to use your wheelchair. But if you are doing take out lots of space to use your wheelchair.

Wow! The staff here are great. They seem to get along well too. I go there every Saturday morning and the drive through person who took my order even remembered my order from before! My breakfast burrito with apple juice. Hahaha. 5 stars.

This is my favourite McDonalds, I always go there around the same time but it has never been busy when I went in there. I always get just a 6 piece nuggets and idk what they do- maybe overcook them a little but I swear to god they are the best nuggets you will ever have in a McDonalds in Vancouver! No sauce required, they are that good. Also the employees are very nice and corteous. One of them even charged my phone for me (which definitely is not in their job description). Kid-friendliness: Happy meals are affordable
Mcdonalds.  Classic food, great taste. No issues with this location - drive thru is fast and efficient (been here numerous times in the past) but usually out of my way to frequent too often Food
The staff is always friendly, constantly cleaning and keeping the line moving. They do a great job!
Woah the service here is impeccable. I go out of my way to visit this McDonald s over all the others. Neato.
Great staff, food always hot, but in a seedy neighborhood...

Excellent, thanks for asking. Got a McMuffin with lettuce, tomato and a touch of mayo it was great. Though it did set me back a bit over 5$ as the guy after me orders a chicken griddle with cheese and spicy mayo was only 3.50ish. still very tasty but paid for the extras.
Always fresh food   and kind works

It s the best place all crew is amazing I always go there and they greet me and serve me amazing some of best employee are Abhay, Keshav, Kuljinder , Janvi, Jasmine, Raman, Manpreet all guys are amazing love you Powell street
This is cerafiably the best McDonald Ive been too, although the menu is not full, there is a drivethru there, which makes it a safer alternative then walking in w/ cash or credit...
The staff at this McDonalds didnt hate their jobs! That was amazing to experience.
Fast and nice servers. There is sometimes some sketchy people outside but never been bothered by them
They made my ice coffee better than other Macdonalds
Good service, quick drive through
Very good
Great food as we all know. Friendly staff

Dean dean youre my ice cream king I love how you did that chai frapp in a large cup thing You make me as happy as when I was a kid and got a kids meal 5 bucks for that drink man that was a deal I hope you Have the best day at work Next time I come I come by I wanna see u twerk
Excellent customer service. Friendly staff. Good collection of the best ladies clothing and accessories
Great service  , Evening Manager Ramandeep Kaur is very polite and have excellent customer service experience
54 seconds from receipt to burger. What more can you ask for from McD s? Well done, friends.
Others may like the Seattle brand coffee; for me & family, McDonalds coffee more to our liking
Janvi best customer service, very poilte and experienced, 5 star for her
Very nice cashier dude
They actually get my order right, and i can eat it, without wearing it, because the burgers arent made so sloppy.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 1610 Davie St, Vancouver, BC V6G 1V9

detailed_reviews.review_text: Long time no visit this location! First visiting after their renovation, nice and clean, friendly staffs and it was super fast. Not even waited 3 minutes! I loved it !
The best location. In the morning it s consistently the same staff and I love that. You know you ll get a warm greeting and a good breakfast.
Fantastic spot to WFH! Get yo self an iced momma of a liquid sugar latte and girl boss those excel spread sheets   Im a freak in the sheets and Im not talking bout excel lmfao. Bagel was just okay...
This is by far the nicest 24 hour McDonalds Ive been in. The staff were friendly, the place was clean, and it wasnt that crowded. Note: this was around 10:00pm.
Quite and clean store near the beach. Very friendly staff and quick service.
I love how they remodeled it. It is so nice inside now. I also love that it is open 24 hours.
Freshly made food.  Fast friendly service on every visit Ive made over several weeks.  I have become a regular customer at this location
Great location and very friendly and fast service. Go here often and I am never disappointed.
What can you say about MDs. Its a great place for a quick bite, and their coffee rivals Timmys.
Had my breakfast there, very pleasant, attentive cashier, light up my day, thank you
Great service, the girls who works tonight are exceptional, specially the one who s not wearing orange
Very nice, clean and lovely customer service. Will be back soon!
Probably the cleanest McDonald s I ve ever been

This review is for the employee Justine. Ive been to this location many times. It often feels a little depressing when you walk in the door and you can see it in the staffs demeanor. One day I walked in for a cold dessert and encountered the bubbliest, happiest, the most joyful employee I have ever encountered. Even with her mask on, I can tell she was smiling ear to ear as she took my order. It felt very welcoming and it was a nice change. The way she would communicate with her coworkers, with so much respect and care, showed me that her demeanor is genuine. The amount of joy she was putting out was radiating throughout the place and I picked up on it. I was having a long day (hence why I came in for the dessert) and she totally changed my mood. Justine is going places and making a lot of people happy in the process. If management sees this review please let Justine know how much of a difference she is making at your location. Its not just the food that makes an establishment stand out.

Monday, April 4th @ 18:39 I ordered A Big Mac and 6 nuggets and it was the best McDonalds meal of my life. Thank you so much for that. The sandwich was perfect, and the nuggets were perfect, and it made me so happy. Thanks again.
I always find McDonalds very popular in public.
extremely efficient and fast, was in and out within 45 seconds during a busy rush. Ive worked customer service for a decade and I know how intense it can get. never had a bar experience here

Wow. First time in a long while I got a hot Quarter Pounder with piping hot French Fries with just the right amount of crisp and salt. The cheese on the burger was actually melted, not the usual cold slab I have grown accustomed to. Best location in Vancouver it seems.  Keep up the good work
The new store is amazing. Very progressive. Staff very friendly and courteous. The new store is definitely more enticing.
The staff was very nice.
Was McDonalds at 3:30am in Vancouver amazing DD

There are people who will say that eating McDonalds food is bad for you and Ill agree with those people, if you eat there everyday!  Once in a while, its a treat.  The service is quick and the food the same regardless of where you get it (except for local variations like in different countries).  Its not inexpensive but again, if its an occasional treat, its delicious!

In 1967, the first McDonalds Canada opened in Richmond, B.C. Weve been growing with our communities and serving quality food at great value ever since. Today, McDonalds Canada is proud to be one of the worlds leading food service retailers. In June 1967, businessman George Tidball brought the McDonalds chain to Canada after buying Western Canada rights from the American corporation for a $50,000 down payment. Tidball got his inspiration while on a road trip to California, where he visited the McDonalds headquarters.
Renovations complete and restaurant is a lot more efficient and well laid out.
Coffee and a muffin for $2.79 , cant beat that price!

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 1701 Robson St, Vancouver, BC V6G 1C9

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have to say, this franchise is in downtown Vancouver but the inside is pretty clean. I have seen the bad and the worse but they have done a pretty good job keeping the interior maintained. There is also working AC inside so it is comfortable to sit and enjoy a meal.
Im back at MD for their premium roast coffee. Cheapest in downtown. Staff was patience and reimburse me after I got confused ordering an extra cup of coffee. Friendly and expeditious.

Had a good experience here. Visited here with my family and Leoni was super helpful and kind, the kind of service one takes time from a busy vacation trip to Vancouver to give a Google review. Cheers,

So sweet of the staff, entire staff is so helpful For a vegeterian to get the food in McDonalds is very difficult, however these staff is really helpful made my life easy Currently McDonalds going on an offer buy 7 hot drinks and get medium coffee for free

Great location close to the sea wall, grab yourself a drink or a snack and walk down to the sea wall. There is paid street parking near here that maybe hard to find during peak hours cuz its Robson Street

This McDonalds is very good with service and cleanliness. The food is fresh and tasty. Given the location and the smaller size of this restaurant I am amazed that the staff is always friendly even when it s exceptionally busy. I especially appreciate the thoughtful service by the older staff that work at this location on occasion.They actually ask if I need condiments or trays and always are very pleasant. Parking: Meter parking on street
Very well maintained restaurant, friendly staff, fast service, neatly cleaned, nice patio.

Most often I just order and bring it home because I live just two blocks away from McDonalds I use to like going to the other location Mainly because I really liked the service and how friendly the staff always was, but things have changed around here and Im not sure whats going to become of the recent changes.  Ill be sure to update that as soon as I see what will happen.  Okay?

It is really a great place with very tasty meals and drinks. I have enjoyed a lot with my friends here. It is the best place i ever headed to. I suggest all my guys and family members to visit here for the best comfort and great taste quality all around the city.

Despite a lineup in Drive Thru, the service was fairly quick. The attendant/cashier was nice, polite, and respectful which is nice. I compliment the staff at this location, because they have always come across as being nice and friendly, and therefore they must actually enjoy their job. Some locations have in the past, been rude to customers.
The fries are good but ordering food here will make you feel like cattle, because its McDonalds
Must try strawberry shake ... its so yumm

theyre always always always very thorough on take out orders and deliveries; I only order from this particular store even though I dont live nearby (anymore) - yes it is fast food big corp but this franchise is special and im loving it.

I just experienced possibly the best costumer service of all time at this location. I was there today and There was a manager, she was doing great job multitasking asked her name (Farahnaz) was very polite, she dressed neatly came with manners, smiles and good attitude. Her costumer service was outstanding overall everything was perfect the food and everywhere was looking perfect. Definitely I recommend this location coz she is an amazing girl and she knows how to manage the store...  bless you
Meh its Mc Donalds I know what Im getting everytime I go. But the staff is great but yeah its McDonalds atmosphere if you call it that lol
It s a 24 hour location. Staffs are well trained and efficient.

Very clean store and the server gave us a 7-layer tall vanilla cone!!!! We re so happy that we finish it right away forgetting taking a picture. Thank you for the big surprise at the end of this Sunday!

The assistant manager here deserves a raise. She single-handedly (literally as well, yesterday she had one arm in cast) handles the craziness you can imagine from a tiny corner mcdonalds. I come here all the time since i live and work a block away, and have never seen her once give less than an excellent customer service. She is prompt and always smiling and helpful that it makes me feel welcomed even when things seem pretty hectic behind the counter. Thanks always!

I acknowledge quality customer service from staff every time at this location. The lady working on weekends with the tattoo always helps me deciding what should i go for and has a great sense of humour.
Im    it
Shannon is a sweetheart. Always the best hard working considerate person. She really cheers me and my friend up with her wonderful nature and smile.

The first McDonalds I have in Vancouver. Drastically different from the states! Enjoyed the experience and the service was good. Can be a little crowded, but that is not necessarily bad because they work quick!
So many adducts and weird smell.
I managed to mess up my order on the app and Mildred helped me sort it out - with a smile. Great customer service.

Great ppl, nice place to get together with all of your friends or family... Go there regularly & have always had real good & friendly service, it is VERY asian-friendly and if you are homeless and can afford a few coffees well your good for the night!! Dont plan on getting some Zzzs at the table as you will definitely find out how seriously drastic, their sudden subtle way of letting you know they have zero tolerance for very sleep deprived folks that helplessly fall asleep.... and I, as with many others that have witnessed in disbelief how much Rude attitude goes into those four five table poundings inches from your sleeping mind.... I mean what a horrible and very mean thing to do to a person that is fallen prey to his physical body shutting down....

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 4445 Main St, Vancouver, BC V5V 3R2

detailed_reviews.review_text: I m giving them a 5 stars as they open at 6 am and service is good.  They seem to know the regulars there and I have witnessed them looking after seniors and those who don t have a place to go.

Sara, Chevy, Joban and Zoey are all my morning time baristas. I get anywhere from 3 to 5 cups of coffee a day and they are always helpful. I ll keep coming back and getting my delicious large caramel lattes as long as they keep serving them! Thank you McDonald s and staff for having fast and friendly service! See you tomorrow am (of course).. Also I want to mention that the management is very professional and always looks out for me I d like to include Sara in this great review!
Small outlet but perfectly maintained. Kiosk ordering would be an ideal thing there

The only McDonalds in the world without the iconic golden arches. Its a great spot to see. Even just take a picture and go. The actual restaurant is pretty standard. I was hoping the actual fry cups would be turquoise as well. Also wish they called it Agave Blue instead.
I go there all the time to get a snack and some ice cream. The restaurant is clean and the staff is friendly. Definitely one of the better McDonald s I ve been to

Only downside is there is no free parking. However you can park in the residential area; just make sure you pay attention to the signs as there is resident only parking in the area. Food, service, & atmosphere as expected at McDonalds.
Good food but not the best one
Very nice service. Friendly and cooperative staff.
Great McDonalds location. Staff is beautiful and polite.
I like my hamburgers to have lettuce and tomatoes.  Thats why I like this place.  For a fast food place, I feel they have the best standard burgers.

Mcdonald s is Macdonald s everywhere, and same here. Which means 5 stars! I love the coffee, I love their hash brown muffins with cheese, and on this particular outing on New Year s eve, the staff brought cheer to me.
Went just for ice cream and it was good. Lost my wallet and staff was very nice(never found it though)

This is a nice, clean and fancy McDonalds restaurant. They served us fast and made us feel welcome. There are no free parking in the front of this McDonalds place, but you can go around and park underground, in the back of the building. I would come again, on my way to Queen Elizabeths Park.
Always good, very busy with Skip the Dishes. Love the mobile app development. While everyone is in line I order from my phone. Separate lineup for mobile order.

Staffs overall very polite and friendly. I come here every morning between 6 am to 7:30 am, one staff particularly outshines others because of her genuine smile and service provided to everyone ( I observed). Her name is Minda. Thank you.
Excellent breakfast from McDonald s today. Great buy. Two Egg McMuffin with bacon and cheese and coffee for $5
Nice and clean. Staff was very thorough and friendly. Just need some work when it comes to sanitizing tables and cleaning off mess when customers leave
Is very clean, the staff is fast in deliver orders. I recommend this location.
Fast food, chicken nuggets were super dry and some bums were guarding their a shopping cart of beer cans
Used coupons to take out our dinner . Staff is friendly to take my order

I am so happy about McDonald at main street, Services is very good and on time , employees very polite and respectful to customers, always I go there and very satisfy, one of the employees name is Polyana , she is so kind and hard worker, I recommend to anyone that location.
Great place to get study and get some work done over a snack. Clean and friendly staff.
lucky open early in the morning
Absolutely love the French fries, and Regular Smarties Mcflurry with Caramel Drizzel on top just down RIGHT AMAZING!!!
Hot food fast was a treat as lunch was late. The staff were efficient and friendly.

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 1482 W Broadway, Vancouver, BC V6H 1H4

detailed_reviews.review_text: They poured a very special cup of espresso in hope that it will help my mother (in hospital with kidney failure).  Im most grateful to the young lady who looked to be possibly from Philippines and the Asian young man (8:20 am on 3 Nov 2023).

I went in for a quick coffee muffin combo.  Ended up staring at my coffee sitting on the counter while the cashier just keep asking me to wait and went busy serving other customers who ordered after I did.  She had totally forgot, again. If you are in a rush, good luck.

Pretty much what you would expect but in a fun part of Vancouver with all kinds of people from all different parts of the city.  A fun environment and clean given the high traffic.  Friendly, quick service.
Mobile order, quick and easy.  Manager was nice and was on top of the mobile orders as soon as guests enter the restaurant.
This is the best service staff I have ever encountered! Very kind to children.
Great value for money! You get a lot of food for a reasonable price.
THAT EMPLOYEE JOHN WITH THE LING HAIR AND GLASSES NEEDS A RAISE!!! BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE I HAVE EVER EXPERIENCED IN MY LIFE

This Mc Donalds is always one of the friendliest and freshest. It is more convenient for us to go to the one on Main Street BUT we drive to this location for the fresher, faster cleaner food. Always kind service.

Not too busy despite being located in such a central location - workers are polite and they usually have everything youd want. The seating area is really nice and I enjoy studying there sometimes. The washrooms were also surprisingly clean each time Ive visited

They make their ice cream cones really big here, and their soft-serve was really, really soft.  So soft that when it was handed to me, it literally toppled over. They promptly gave me a new one... with a cup for safety!!! Great service
The fries at this fast food chain are always crispy and seasoned just right.
Family-friendly place with something for everyone. Always a hit with my kids.

I arrived during night shift, at 1:30 a.m. . Well there was a half dozen people there, 1/3 still waiting in line, it was extremely quick from the time I arrived till I received my order and was sitting down eating. I feel the night shift is underappreciated as they clearly work exceptionally hard, producing high quality food( high quality in McDonalds standards), and when somebody says fast food they (Then this overnight McDonalds shift is fast, as if hey take it to heart.}Taking pride in producing high quality food at such a rapid pace!!!
this place is actually really great, the service is nice and fast and it s overall pretty clean. like they made my milkshake in a minute im not even kidding. so five stars :))

The staff was very friendly and helpful. Polite is another trait the staff possessed. The time of opening at 7:00am is very convenient for me. Die to the CO-VID  situation, the dine in feature and the washrooms are obviously closed but it is okay because they have plenty of room for their pick up feature. I enjoy coming here in my morning commute because its location is very clean and very quiet. I highly recommend this place for the person on the go or just want a quick fix for the morning or day depending on the time of day one goes.
Sure its busy... With good reason! Friendly staff, great service and fast getting my order. Everything you want for eats! Thank you.
Keith was really friendly and was zooming around the place taking care of things! Thanks!
really friendly and kind staff
Always fast food and great service, applaud the staff here as the demands and challenges are varied and not easy to overcome.
Kinda of small but quick service

Updated review: Perhaps my last review sparked something here because their attitude and listening skills improved. I used to get breakfast here a couple of times a week and eventually one of the ladies started recognising me and remembering my order and I would usually just have to confirm between two items that I always ordered. I am now working from home so I no longer go there, but I sometimes miss my little routine and receiving great customer service! Previous review: This is one of the worst locations Ive been to in Vancouver.  There are two women here that are part of the morning crew who give the most horrendous service I have ever experienced and one of them is a supervisor/manager. They dont know how to listen and as a result they get my order wrong...often. Theres nothing complicated about ordering a McMuffin without cheese and two hashbrowns. When I order coffee, they get the size or number of creams wrong. This isnt Starbucks and Im not ordering a complicated drink but somehow a simple cup of coffee gets messed up almost every time. They often ring in my order wrong and I have to repeat myself two or three times before they get it right and they like to argue with me as if Im doing something wrong. I speak perfect English and they seem to as well, but clearly their listening skills are lacking.

After being thoroughly soaked in the Vancouver dreadful weather, we were immediately cheered by the warm welcoming smile of your employee Colin. He was so helpful as I had lost my glasses and couldnt read the board, so he talked us through the options and prices and informed us of the combos, as well as the current monopoly promotion. Its good to see there are still kind young people today.
Quick friendly service considering all the rude impatient delivery pickup drivers this place gets

I get my coffee here every morning going to work and the ladies that work her are so polite, prompt, and pleasant. (Ooh look alliteration! Thank you high school English.) One lady even knows my order and gets it ready when she sees me enter in the morning. Stellar service from McDonalds staff on the morning shift.
best egg blt ever. and dude at cash was nice even as i took my time getting my mcrewards out thanks

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 537 W Broadway, Vancouver, BC V5Z 1E6

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very very clean , washrooms are locked and you need to ask for a key . Service quick and great staff.
the morning staff is so sweet i always stop for a coffee in the morning and they memorized my order and make it for me and hand it to me while i m in the line to pay!
The cleanliness of the restrooms at this fast food chain is impressive. Its always a pleasant surprise.
Busy place but good service. Friendly staff.

Its the first McDonalds where I go where the food was really hot, that was a very good surprise! Also very fresh. Staff was courteous and efficient but no exceptional service. I find the place a little gloomy though and there are no kiosks in this location.
Manager was super nice, I dropped my chicken Big Mac and they gave me another for free

Go to after swimming or the park. Clean, good service and a great team to hear of!! Gots my order quickly, food was fresh and hot! Yusss! Big thank you to this location! Kid-friendliness: Clean, clear of clutter and family get together. Wheelchair accessibility: No stairs to climb.
Location was clean at the time of our visit, service was prompt and accurate, and the food was good. What more can you ask for? Decent outlet and would visit again anytime.

I come by very often, if not to shop to wait for the bus. The staff are extremely nice and Im always happy when I see some of the regular workers doing a great job. Parking: Theres no parking in that block that Im aware of but there is a parking garage one block up from the place

Icecream milk was melted and the McDs was tiny location very humid Hott and muggy seemingly inside and the seatings are so close together not far apart so is hard and difficult to have a personal conversation about anything other than that didnt really notice about the cleanliness or any of that cause as I was busy trying to stay in contact with my friend off of wifi from that location to my friend that was watching over my place until I returned back home  its in a busy busy location though so is alright but Id suggest if theres a picnic table in the shade or under a tree or something nearby go there to eat and drink ect enjoy your treats too lol

I like McDonalds for a quick bite or coffee. Their coffee is really good and inexpensive. This McDonalds restaurant is special. Every table has fresh cut garden flowers in season.  This is quite unique.  I have not seen this in any other McDonalds restaurant. The place is clean.
Very good chicken mcmuffin, nice and juicy. Fast service and friendly staff. They deserve a raise!
Super quick and clean
When it comes to fast food, it doesnt get faster than this!!! Service & food is pronto!!! Always a reliable standby, McDonalds is a convenient eat on the run food destination.
Hello and good day to all,That day and time I was hot and ready to pass out I was able to get cold water and sit down in a air condition dinning room that ment the world to me.
Food is the same as any other McRestaurant and this restaurant is pretty small even though it is in a very busy street, but the service was very good. Staff was very kind and helpful.
Great didnt mess up the order, quick service, kind workers.
I always liked their service. Friendly staff particularly evening staff. Better that Tims down the road
Food was fresh, and hot, put together with care, and delicious!
Super fast and friendly. I always come here for my sweet bread cravings
Best Mcflurry skor here. They blend it well. Parking: No parking
Good fast service. Please do not over toast bagel   delicious breakfast at Mc Donald s
Great service clean.   Friendly.... Needs more seating for disabled
Rotten Ronnies still the best,  most consistent
Fast service, polite staff,good food

name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, Waterfront Centre, 200 Burrard St Unit 5, Vancouver, BC V6C 3L6

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice as usual. Many tourists who barely speaks English slow down line to turtle speed. The best option is to order through the phone Mac app with pick up at this location. Really big food court with lots of tables and even some amount of tables outside next to  water cascade. The biggest minus is that they have really limited menu, for example smoothies are not present.

Fast and efficient service. Young ladies working behind the counters were courteous and polite even though they were running a very busy location. Fries were fresh and milk shakes were good too. name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 2391 W 4th Ave, Vancouver, BC V6K 1P2

detailed_reviews.review_text: I do not order from McDonalds often. Only when I am in a pinch with my 3 year old who needs to eat right away when were abroad! So I appreciated the sales person answering all of my questions. And the food came out super fast. Little man gobbled it up with no complaints. I like the restaurant now lets you do milk and fruit to sub the fries and sodas.
Fast service. Fresh (well  I mean hot and newly cooked) food. Convenient location.
Yeah... Im reviewing a McDs. This one is special. Top tier everything.

I had to charge my device as not to miss an urgent university correspondence. All coffee shop seats were taken. Here they let me charge my device for a moment. And they served me super super fast. Best service world wide
The prices are affordable, making it a budget-friendly option for a delicious meal.

Had a Great visit with great people in this location. Ordered on the app in the afternoon but didnt pay attention one of the meal serving just until 11am. They fixed my order with replacing the different meal. Thank you guys!

The most consistent McDonalds Ive ever known. Their big macs are always amazing, and Ive never had old fries. Always fresh, hot and delicious. Best McNuggets in Vancouver. Seriously love this McDonalds.
Handy location for a sneaky meal. Its fun to recognize the regulars.

I had ordered an Uber Eats delivery for a couple of Happy Meals prior to halloween. I was expecting to also receive the halloween candy buckets as I had called in earlier to confirm that food deliveries were included. When I got delivery I only got the standard brown Mcdonalds bag. I called in to this location and the evening manager there (6pm-1am) went above and beyond to make things right. Great customer service.
Thank you so much for giving me the Pokemon book for my little boy even though I didn t buy a happy meal. Your staff are so great! Five out of five stars for speed and friendly service!
The store s toilet was always clean Parking: Parking at the rear of the building Food : 2/5 |
Very well managed, friendly staff.
Mmmmmmmim loving it. Small boutique haburger restaurant. Friendly staff, a few tables. Generally clean. Takes all payment methods. Better than the big brands. Food : 5/5
The best human being ever. The manager Sammi has a heart of gold.
The burgers at this location are fresh and juicy, it is probably the best McD s burger around. Whereas the Davie and Cardero location tastes like cardboard.

The mobile app was giving me issues and the staff here were so kind and helpful. This location seems really well run. Edited to add: This. is. the. best. McDonalds. honestly. Whoever made my burger tonight, you are a legend. I always ask for extra onions and pickles and typically get a meager amount, but this person tonight put literal handfuls on and I am delighted. Thank you, friend.
Teresa is still amazing. The rest,  not so much.  This location has declined drastically.

Easy place to pick up a quick breakfast, lunch or dinner. In these times with the Covid pandemic restrictions this mcdonalds is doing a good job of serving people. The people working here are very nice and provide good service. Try it.
I don t go to this Mcdonald s very often but every time I have amazing services as my mobile order was always ready and waiting for me with great customer services and pretty easy getting parking.
This was  My fathers favorite spot . He loved the staff and all the friendly people. I miss you Doug Thompson  (Dad)
